buff_desc_spelleffects: This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.
buff_desc_unsealedspellbook_chargetracke:
{{perk_displayname_UnsealedSpellbook}}
Your next Summoner Spell swap is coming soon.
Source: @SourceName@
buff_desc_unsealedspellbook_ooctracker:
{{perk_displayname_UnsealedSpellbook}}
You are unable to switch Summoner Spells whilst in combat or using Teleport.
Source: @SourceName@
buff_desc_unsealedspellbook_swapavailabl:
{{perk_displayname_UnsealedSpellbook}}
You can swap to a different Summoner Spell when you are out of combat.
Source: @SourceName@
game_announcement_kingporodispelled_blue: Blue team has dispelled the Poro King!
game_announcement_kingporodispelled_enem: The enemy team has dispelled the Poro King!
game_announcement_kingporodispelled_purp: Purple team has dispelled the Poro King!
game_announcement_kingporodispelled_red: Red team has dispelled the Poro King!
game_announcement_kingporodispelled_your: Your team has dispelled the Poro King!
game_dynamicmenutext_[playerhud]_innates: <titleLeft>Innate Heal</titleLeft><titleRight>[B]</titleRight><subtitleLeft><font color='#FF9900'>Click to Use</font></subtitleLeft><mainText>You heal 100% of your Health over 12 seconds while channeling.  The effect starts out small and increases over time.</mainText>
game_dynamicmenutext_[playerhud]_unlearn: <postScriptTitle><font color='#FF0000'>You have not yet learned this ability!</font></postScriptTitle>
game_item_quest_frostqueensline_store_sp:
QUEST: Earn @Effect17Amount@ gold using this item and upgrade to Frostfang.
REWARD: Gain UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.
game_item_quest_frostqueenslinett_store_:
QUEST: Earn @Effect17Amount@ gold using this item and upgrade to {{ game_item_displayname_3311 }}.
REWARD: Tribute is upgraded into Queen's Tribute.
game_ping_manastackingspell_outofmana: @SrcNameWithColon@@SlotName@<font color='#C1FFAF'> - Not enough Mana, @SubA@s Remaining on Stacks</font>
game_spell_bloodmoonboots: <titleLeft>Predator</titleLeft><mainText>Gain increased Move Speed, ramping up to 25-50% Move Speed over 1.5 seconds, while chasing enemy champions. After ramping up, damaging attacks or abilities to champions end this effect, dealing 20-180 (+<scaleAD>0.25</scaleAD> bonus AD)(+<scaleAP>0.15</scaleAP> AP) bonus<lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive damage</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.</mainText>
game_spell_description_absolutezero: Nunu begins to sap the area of heat, slowing all nearby enemies. When Absolute Zero ends, he deals massive damage to all enemies caught in the area.
game_spell_description_asheq: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.
game_spell_description_ashespiritoftheha: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.
game_spell_description_aspectofthecougar: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.
game_spell_description_aurelionsole:
Aurelion Sol summons a black hole, damaging enemies and slowly pulling them toward its center. This ability grants Stardust each time an enemy dies within the black hole and for each second an enemy champion is caught inside it.

The center of the black hole executes enemies who are below a certain percentage of their maximum health.

Stardust increases Singularity's area as well as the execution threshold.
game_spell_description_aurelionsolq: Aurelion Sol channels his dragon breath for a few seconds, damaging the first enemy hit and splashing reduced damage onto nearby enemies. Each second the breath is channeled directly at an enemy will deal bonus damage, which is improved by the amount of Stardust that's been collected. This ability collects Stardust if the target is a champion.
game_spell_description_aurelionsolr:
Falling Star: Aurelion Sol crashes a star into the earth. This impact deals magic damage and stuns enemies while also granting Stardust for each enemy champion it hits. Gathering enough Stardust transforms Aurelion Sol's next Falling Star into The Skies Descend.

The Skies Descend: Aurelion Sol drags a giant star down from the heavens with an increased impact zone and increased damage, knocking up enemies rather than stunning them. A shockwave then spreads from the edge of the impact zone, which damages and slows the enemies it hits.

Stardust increases the impact area of both Falling Star and The Skies Descend.
game_spell_description_aurelionsolw:
Aurelion Sol flies over terrain in a targeted direction. While in this state, he can cast other abilities. Breath of Light no longer has a cooldown or maximum channel duration and deals increased damage while flying.

Astral Flight's remaining cooldown is reduced whenever an enemy champion dies after being recently damaged by Aurelion Sol.

Stardust increases Astral Flight's maximum range.
game_spell_description_azirewrapper: Azir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.
game_spell_description_azirpassive: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of a turret.
game_spell_description_azirqwrapper: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.
game_spell_description_azirr: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
game_spell_description_azirw: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to Azir and his Sand Soldiers.
game_spell_description_backstab: Shaco's basic attack critically strikes for extra damage when striking a unit from behind. Units can't be Backstabbed more than once every few seconds, modified by Shaco's cooldown reduction.
game_spell_description_barde: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.
game_spell_description_bardpchimes: Bard's presence causes magical chimes to appear, which grant Bard experience, mana, and a burst of speed. Additionally, lesser spirits follow Bard and aid in his attacks - collecting chimes causes these meeps to gain power over the course of the game.
game_spell_description_bardpspiritmissil: The meeps that follow Bard assist with his basic attacks, dealing magic damage. As Bard collects chimes, they get slowing and area-of-effect powers while also increasing in number.
game_spell_description_bardq: Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both.
game_spell_description_bardr: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.
game_spell_description_bardw: Reveals a healing shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing the first ally that touches it.
game_spell_description_blessingoftheliza: This unit's attacks slow the target and burn them over several seconds. If the buff holder is slain, this buff is transferred to their killer.
game_spell_description_blindmonkeone:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.
Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Move Speed for 4 seconds. Move Speed recovers gradually over the duration.
game_spell_description_blindmonketwo: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Move Speed for @SlowDuration@ seconds. Move Speed recovers gradually over the duration.
game_spell_description_blindmonkqone:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage based on the target's missing Health.
game_spell_description_blindmonkqtwo: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage based on the target's missing Health.
game_spell_description_blindmonkr: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.
game_spell_description_blindmonkrkick: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.
game_spell_description_blindmonkwone:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.
game_spell_description_blindmonkwtwo: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For @Effect8Amount@ seconds, Lee Sin gains Lifesteal and Spell Vamp.
game_spell_description_brandablaze: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing 8% of their maximum Health in magic damage over 4 seconds. Brand's autoattacks apply Blaze to minions and monsters. (Max: 80 damage per second vs. Monsters)
game_spell_description_brandablazebomb: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing 8% of their maximum Health in magic damage over 4 seconds. Brand's autoattacks apply Blaze to minions and monsters. (Max: 80 damage per second vs. Monsters)
game_spell_description_brande: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing magic damage to them. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.
game_spell_description_brandq: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 1.5 seconds.
game_spell_description_brandr: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing magic damage each time it bounces, up to 5 bounces. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.
game_spell_description_brandw: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.
game_spell_description_braume: Braum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds, intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction.
game_spell_description_braumpassive:
Braum's basic attacks apply Concussive Blows. Once the first stack is applied, ally basic attacks also stack Concussive Blows.

Upon reaching 4 stacks, the target is stunned and takes magic damage. For the next few seconds they cannot receive new stacks, but take bonus magic damage from Braum's attacks.
game_spell_description_braumq:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.
game_spell_description_braumrwrapper: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.
game_spell_description_braumw: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.
game_spell_description_burningagony: Dr. Mundo drains his Health to reduce the duration of disables and deal continual damage to nearby enemies.
game_spell_description_bushwhack: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
game_spell_description_caitlynaceintheho: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
game_spell_description_caitlynentrapment: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.
game_spell_description_caitlynheadshotmi: Caitlyn Headshots targets she has trapped or netted for bonus damage. Additionally, she gains a free headshot every few basic attacks; attacks while in brush count as 2.
game_spell_description_caitlynpiltoverpe: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).
game_spell_description_caitlynyordletrap: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds.
game_spell_description_camillee: Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemies upon landing.
game_spell_description_camilleq: Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus Move Speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks.
game_spell_description_camiller: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.
game_spell_description_camillew: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.
game_spell_description_cardmasterstack: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.
game_spell_description_carpetbomb: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.
game_spell_description_carpetbombmega: Corki's Valkyrie is upgraded into Special Delivery. He flies a great distance, dropping bombs that knock aside enemies and create a trail of destruction that damage and slows opponents who remain in the fire.
game_spell_description_cassiopeiae: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.
game_spell_description_cassiopeiaq: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Move Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
game_spell_description_cassiopeiar: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
game_spell_description_cassiopeiaw: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.
game_spell_description_chronoshift: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.
game_spell_description_consume: Willump takes a bite out of a target minion, monster, or enemy champion, dealing heavy damage to it and healing himself.
game_spell_description_corpseexplosion: Whenever a nearby enemy dies around Amumu, their corpse explodes dealing damage to all surrounding enemy units.
game_spell_description_crystallize: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.
game_spell_description_dariusexecuterank: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. At Rank 3, if Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is completely refreshed.
game_spell_description_dariushemo: Darius's attacks and damaging abilities cause enemies to bleed for physical damage over 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
game_spell_description_dariushemomarker: Darius's attacks and damaging abilities cause enemies to bleed for physical damage over 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
game_spell_description_deceive:
Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.

His first attack while Invisible is empowered, dealing bonus damage and reducing Deceive's cooldown
game_spell_description_defensiveballcurl: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him.
Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him.
game_spell_description_destiny: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.
game_spell_description_dianaarc: Diana swings her blade to unleash a bolt of lunar energy that deals damage in an arc before exploding. Afflicts enemies struck with the Moonlight debuff, revealing them if they are not stealthed.
game_spell_description_dianaorbs: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.
game_spell_description_dianateleport: Diana dashes to an enemy and deals magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to a target afflicted with Moonlight.
game_spell_description_dianavortex: Diana draws in and slows all nearby enemies. Passively grants Diana attack speed after spell casts.
game_spell_description_disintegrate: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
game_spell_description_doombotsbossteemo: Like a basic attack, but better in every way. Just like Teemo.
You really shouldn't stand that close to a mushroom that big, you know.
game_spell_description_doombotsgiantdart: These darts are big, pitchfork-ey, <font color='#797c80'>and <font color='#686c70'>make <font color='#565b5f'>it <font color='#454a4e'>very <font color='#353b40'>difficult <font color='#2a3136'>to see</font></font></font></font></font></font>
game_spell_description_dragonburning: Deals damage over time and reduces damage dealt.
game_spell_description_dravendoubleshot: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.
game_spell_description_dravenfury: Draven gains increased Move Speed and Attack Speed. The Move Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.
game_spell_description_dravenrcast: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.
game_spell_description_dravenrdoublecast: Cause Whirling Death to reverse direction early, returning to Draven.
game_spell_description_dravenspinning: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.
game_spell_description_ekkoe: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.
game_spell_description_ekkopassive: Ekko's Zero-Drive charges his spells and attacks with temporal energy. The third hit deals bonus damage and, if the target is a champion, Ekko gains accelerated Move Speed.
game_spell_description_ekkoq: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.
game_spell_description_ekkor: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.
game_spell_description_ekkow: Ekko splits the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and triggers a detonation, stunning enemies by suspending them in time.
game_spell_description_elisehumane:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy. After descending on an enemy target, Elise's bonus damage and healing from Spider Queen is increased.
game_spell_description_elisehumanq:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
game_spell_description_elisehumanw:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
game_spell_description_eliser: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for Move Speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
game_spell_description_eliserdummy: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for Move Speed and new abilities.
game_spell_description_eliserspider: Transforms into Human Form, removing Spider Form bonuses but granting the ability to generate new Spiderlings by casting spells.
game_spell_description_elisespidere: Ascends into the air, briefly becoming untargetable, and then descends upon an enemy.
game_spell_description_elisespiderq:
Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.

Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.
game_spell_description_elisespiderw: Elise and her Spiderlings gain a burst of Attack Speed.
game_spell_description_enchantedcrystala: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.
game_spell_description_evelynne: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains Move Speed for a short duration.
game_spell_description_evelynne2: Evelynn's first cast of Whiplash after entering her passive, Demon Shade, deals increased damage and moves her to her target.
game_spell_description_evelynnq: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes up to 3 times.
game_spell_description_evelynnq2: Evelynn fires a line of spikes through an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.
game_spell_description_evelynnr: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.
game_spell_description_evelynnw: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.
game_spell_description_eyeofthestorm: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.
game_spell_description_feast: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.
game_spell_description_feralscream: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
game_spell_description_fiorae: Fiora has increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack slows the target, and the second attack will critically strike.
game_spell_description_fioraq: Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.
game_spell_description_fiorar: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on an enemy champion and gains Move Speed while near them. If Fiora hits all four Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.
game_spell_description_fioraw: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.
game_spell_description_fizze: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.
game_spell_description_fizzq: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.
game_spell_description_fizzr: Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.
game_spell_description_fizzw: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage and empower his further attacks for a short time.
game_spell_description_flashfrost: Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.
game_spell_description_fling: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
game_spell_description_forcepulse: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.
game_spell_description_frostbite: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing a low amount of damage. If the target was recently stunned by Flash Frost or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled.
game_spell_description_galioe: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.
game_spell_description_galioq: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.
game_spell_description_galior: Galio grants damage reduction to an ally. After a delay Galio smashes down on the ally's original location, knocking up nearby enemies.
game_spell_description_galiow: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt and damage nearby enemies.
game_spell_description_gangplanke: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.
game_spell_description_gangplankqwrapper: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.
game_spell_description_gangplankr: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
game_spell_description_gangplankw: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.
game_spell_description_ggun: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.
game_spell_description_glacialstorm: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.
game_spell_description_gnare:
Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.
game_spell_description_gnarq:
Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.
game_spell_description_gnarr: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them.  Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.
game_spell_description_gnarw:
Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Move Speed.

Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area.
game_spell_description_gragase: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.
game_spell_description_gragasq: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their Move Speed slowed.
game_spell_description_gragasqtoggle: Reactivate to detonate the barrel early.  Enemies struck by the blast have their Move Speed slowed.
game_spell_description_gragasr: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.
game_spell_description_graveschargeshot: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.
game_spell_description_gravesmove: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.
game_spell_description_gravesqlinespell: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.
game_spell_description_gravessmokegrenad: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke that reduces sight range. Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt magic damage and have their Move Speed reduced briefly.
game_spell_description_hallucinate: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets).  Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
game_spell_description_hallucinatefull: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets). Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
game_spell_description_hallucinateguide: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets). Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
game_spell_description_heimerdingere: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.
game_spell_description_heimerdingerq: Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).
game_spell_description_heimerdingerr: Heimerdinger invents an upgrade, causing his next spell to have increased effects.
game_spell_description_heimerdingerulted: Heimerdinger UPGRADES!!! his CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade, lobbing a bouncing grenade that discharges three times. It slows for 80% and its slow and stun radiuses are larger.
game_spell_description_heimerdingerultqd: Heimerdinger UPGRADES!!! his H-28G Evolution Turret, placing an enormous turret that slows targets, charges beams twice as fast, and has splash damage, increased range, damage, and health.
game_spell_description_heimerdingerultwd: Heimerdinger UPGRADES!!! his Hextech Micro-Rockets, firing four waves of long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.
game_spell_description_heimerdingerw: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.
game_spell_description_heraldleapattack: The Rift Herald charges at enemies and turrets, dealing massive damage and knocking enemies aside.
game_spell_description_heraldspinattack: The Rift Herald swipes its claw at nearby enemies and turrets, dealing massive damage.
game_spell_description_howlinggale: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.
game_spell_description_illaoie: Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a <font color='#669900'>Vessel</font> and begin spawning Tentacles.
game_spell_description_illaoiq: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.
game_spell_description_illaoir: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.
game_spell_description_illaoiw: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.
game_spell_description_incinerate: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
game_spell_description_infectedcleavermi: Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing damage equal to a portion of his target's current Health and slowing them for a short time. Dr. Mundo delights in the suffering of others, so he is returned a portion of the Health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver (doubled on killing blows).
game_spell_description_infernalguardian: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
game_spell_description_infernalguardiang: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
game_spell_description_insanitypotion: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.
game_spell_description_ireliae: Irelia sends out two blades which converge on each other. Enemies caught in between are damaged, stunned and Marked.
game_spell_description_ireliaq: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, healing herself. If the target is Marked or dies to Bladesurge, its cooldown refreshes.
game_spell_description_ireliar: Irelia fires a massive number of blades that explode outward upon hitting an enemy champion. Enemies hit by the blades are damaged and Marked. Afterwards the blades form a wall that will damage, slow and disarm enemies that walk through it.
game_spell_description_ireliaw: Irelia charges a strike that deals more damage as she charges. She takes reduced damage during the charge.
game_spell_description_itemglacialspike: Slows all enemies caught in its blizzard
game_spell_description_itemglacialspiket: Slows all enemies caught in its blizzard
game_spell_description_itemtiamatcleave: Cleaves the area around you, dealing physical damage based on your Attack Damage.
game_spell_description_jackinthebox: Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies.
game_spell_description_jarvanivcataclysm: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.
game_spell_description_jarvanivdemacians: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.
game_spell_description_jarvanivdragonstr: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
game_spell_description_jarvanivgoldenaeg: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
game_spell_description_jarvanivmartialca: The first basic attack on an enemy deals bonus physical damage. This effect cannot occur again on the same target for a short duration.
game_spell_description_javelintoss: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.  As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.
game_spell_description_jaxcounterstrike: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.
game_spell_description_jaxempowertwo: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.
game_spell_description_jaxleapstrike: Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.
game_spell_description_jaxrelentlessassa: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.
game_spell_description_jayceaccelerator:
Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Move Speed of all allied champions who pass through it.
If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.
game_spell_description_jaycehypercharge: Gains a burst of energy increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.
game_spell_description_jayceshockblast: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies in the area of the explosion.
game_spell_description_jaycestancegth: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.
game_spell_description_jaycestancehtg:
Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist.

Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.
game_spell_description_jaycestaticfield:
Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds.

Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.
game_spell_description_jaycethunderingbl:
Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance.

Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Move Speed of all allied champions who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.
game_spell_description_jaycetotheskies:
Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies.

Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
game_spell_description_jhine:
Jhin places an invisible lotus trap that blooms when walked over. It slows nearby enemies before dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals.

Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a lotus trap will bloom near their corpse.
game_spell_description_jhinpassive: Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of Move Speed.
game_spell_description_jhinq: Jhin launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time it kills.
game_spell_description_jhinr: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.
game_spell_description_jhinw: Jhin brandishes his cane, firing a single shot with incredible range. It pierces through minions and monsters, but stops on the first champion hit. If the target was recently struck by Jhin's allies, lotus traps, or damaged by Jhin, they are rooted.
game_spell_description_jinxe: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.
game_spell_description_jinxq: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, and drain Mana.
game_spell_description_jinxr: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.
game_spell_description_jinxw: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.
game_spell_description_kaisae:
Kai'Sa briefly increases her Move Speed, then increases her attack speed.

Living Weapon: Supercharge is upgraded to briefly grant Invisibility.
game_spell_description_kaisaq:
Kai'Sa shoots a swarm of missiles that seek out nearby targets.

Living Weapon: Icathian Rain is upgraded to shoot more missiles.
game_spell_description_kaisar: Kai'Sa dashes near an enemy champion.
game_spell_description_kaisaw:
Kai'Sa shoots a long range missile, marking enemies with her passive.

Living Weapon: Void Seeker is upgraded to apply more passive marks and reduce cooldown on champion hit.
game_spell_description_kalistacoopstrike: When Kalista and her Oathsworn both basic attack the same target within 1.5 seconds, they deal bonus damage.
game_spell_description_kalistaexpungewra: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.
game_spell_description_kalistamysticshot: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
game_spell_description_kalistarx: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.
game_spell_description_kalistaw:
Passively gain Attack Damage when near her Oathsworn ally, and deal bonus damage when striking the same target.

Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.
game_spell_description_karmamantra: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.
game_spell_description_karmaq:
Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.
game_spell_description_karmaqmissilemant: Karma increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm slowing all enemies in the area and dealing damage after a brief delay.
game_spell_description_karmasolkimshield:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Move Speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.
game_spell_description_karmaspiritbind:
Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.
game_spell_description_karthusdefile: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.
game_spell_description_karthusfallenone: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.
game_spell_description_karthuslaywastea1: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
game_spell_description_karthuswallofpain: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Move Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.
game_spell_description_katarinadaggerpic: Katarina picks up her <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font>, slashing through all nearby enemies for massive damage.
game_spell_description_katarinae: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.
game_spell_description_katarinaewrapper: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.
game_spell_description_katarinaq: Katarina throws a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.
game_spell_description_katarinar: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.
game_spell_description_katarinaw: Katarina gains a burst of Move Speed, tossing a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> into the air directly above herself.
game_spell_description_kaynpassiveass: For the first few seconds in combat with enemy champion, Kayn deals extra magic damage.
game_spell_description_kaynq: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.
game_spell_description_kaynr: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.
game_spell_description_kaynw: Kayn damages and slows targets in a line.
game_spell_description_kennenbringthelig: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.
game_spell_description_kennenlightningru: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units and apply a Mark of the Storm. Kennen gains defense and Move Speed when entering this form, and attack speed when leaving it.
game_spell_description_kennenlrcancel: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units and apply a Mark of the Storm. Kennen gains defense and Move Speed when entering this form, and attack speed when leaving it.
game_spell_description_kennenshurikenhur: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of Storm to any opponent that it hits.
Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.
Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.
game_spell_description_kennenshurikensto: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.
game_spell_description_kennenshurikenthr: Kennen throws a fast moving lightning shuriken at a target enemy, causing damage and adding a Mark of Storm to any opponent that it hits.
game_spell_description_khazixe: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Wings</font>, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.
game_spell_description_khazixelong: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Wings</font>, Leap's range increases by 200, and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.
game_spell_description_khazixq: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Reaper Claws</font>, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
game_spell_description_khazixqdr: Taste Their Fear deals bonus damage to targets <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> away from their allies.
game_spell_description_khazixqlong: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Reaper Claws</font>, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
game_spell_description_khazixr: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisible</font>, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Move Speed. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Adaptive Cloaking</font>, Void Assault gains increased <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisibility</font> duration, and an additional use.
game_spell_description_khazixw: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Spike Racks</font>, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets are slowed for extra.
game_spell_description_kindrede: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. Following up with three additional attacks causes Wolf to pounce on the target, savaging them for huge damage.
game_spell_description_kindredewrapper: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
game_spell_description_kindredq: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
game_spell_description_kindredr: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.
game_spell_description_kindredw: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.  Lamb passively gains stacks by moving and attacking. When fully charged, Lamb's next attack restores health.
game_spell_description_kingporofall: When summoned, the Poro King descends gracefully from the skies above, dealing magic damage to enemies in an area around his impact.
game_spell_description_klede: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.
game_spell_description_kledq:
Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.

When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.
game_spell_description_kledr: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.
game_spell_description_kledriderq: Kled fires a gun blast, hurling him backward. Hitting enemy champions restores <font color='#eae57e'>courage</font>.
game_spell_description_kledw: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.
game_spell_description_kogmawbioarcaneba: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.
game_spell_description_kogmawicathiansur: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to detonate after 4 seconds, dealing true damage to surrounding enemies.
game_spell_description_kogmawlivingartil: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.
game_spell_description_kogmawq: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.
game_spell_description_kogmawvoidooze: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
game_spell_description_landslide: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.
game_spell_description_leblance: LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc roots them and deals additional damage.
game_spell_description_leblancp: When LeBlanc falls below 40% health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.
game_spell_description_leblancq: LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing additional damage.
game_spell_description_leblancr: LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells.
game_spell_description_leblancre: LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc roots them and deals additional damage.
game_spell_description_leblancrq: LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing additional damage.
game_spell_description_leblancrw: LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location.
game_spell_description_leblancrwreturn: LeBlanc returns to her red marker.
game_spell_description_leblancw: LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location.
game_spell_description_leblancwreturn: LeBlanc returns to her yellow marker.
game_spell_description_leonashieldofdayb: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.
game_spell_description_leonasolarbarrier: Leona raises her shield to gain Armor and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.
game_spell_description_leonasolarflare: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed. Afterward, Leona's sword is charged with the power of the sun and deals bonus magic damage for a few attacks.
game_spell_description_leonasunlight: Leona's spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for a short duration. When allied Champions deal damage to those enemies, they consume the Sunlight to deal bonus magic damage.
game_spell_description_leonazenithblade: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.
game_spell_description_lissandrae: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
game_spell_description_lissandraq: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Move Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.
game_spell_description_lissandrar: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Move Speed.
game_spell_description_lissandraw: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.
game_spell_description_luciane: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.
game_spell_description_lucianq: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.
game_spell_description_lucianr: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.
game_spell_description_lucianw: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking enemies. Lucian gains Move Speed for attacking marked enemies.
game_spell_description_lulue: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.
game_spell_description_lulupassivemissil: Pix fires magical bolts of energy whenever the champion he's following attacks another enemy unit. These bolts are homing, but can be intercepted by other units.
game_spell_description_luluq: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.
game_spell_description_lulur: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
game_spell_description_luluw: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Move Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.
game_spell_description_malzahare:
Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions.

If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.
game_spell_description_malzaharq: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.
game_spell_description_malzaharr: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.
game_spell_description_malzaharw: Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.
game_spell_description_maokaie: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.
game_spell_description_maokaiq: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.
game_spell_description_maokair: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.
game_spell_description_maokaiw: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.
game_spell_description_masochism: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage based on his missing health, and his next basic attack headbutts his target for additional damage. Passively increases magic resist whenever Dr. Mundo is dealt magic damage or pays a health cost.
game_spell_description_masteryidoublestr: Master Yi attacks his enemy twice.
game_spell_description_megaadhesive: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.
game_spell_description_milioe: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.
game_spell_description_milioq: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Milio to heal his allies.
game_spell_description_milior: Gains movement speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.
game_spell_description_missilebarrage: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
game_spell_description_moltenshield: Grants Annie and Tibbers increased percentage Damage Resist and damages enemies who attack with basic attacks.
game_spell_description_monkeykingdecoy: Wukong becomes Invisible for a short duration, leaving behind a decoy that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it when Wukong's stealth expires.
game_spell_description_monkeykingdoublea: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.
game_spell_description_monkeykingnimbus: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.
game_spell_description_monkeykingspintow: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Move Speed over the duration of the spell.
Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Move Speed over the duration of the spell.
game_spell_description_mordekaiserchildr: Mordekaiser curses an enemy champion or the Dragon, stealing a percent of their life initially and each second. If the target dies while the spell is active, their soul is enslaved and will follow Mordekaiser as a ghost.
game_spell_description_mordekaisercotggu: Mordekaiser curses an enemy, stealing a percent of their life initially and each second. If the target dies while the spell is active, their soul is enslaved and will follow Mordekaiser as a ghost.
game_spell_description_mordekaisercreepi: Coats an ally in magnetic metal, increasing each unit's Move Speed toward one another. While near one another, the metal swirls violently dealing damage per second to enemies.
game_spell_description_mordekaisere: Mordekaiser tears the spirits away from his enemies, slowing them for a duration.
game_spell_description_mordekaisermaceof: Mordekaiser's next three attacks deal escalating bonus damage.
game_spell_description_mordekaiserp: Mordekaiser cannot be slowed, and death is merely an inconvenience.
game_spell_description_mordekaiserq: Mordekaiser can smash his mace on the ground, then knock back an enemy.
game_spell_description_mordekaiserr: Mordekaiser pulls a target into the Realm of the Dead
game_spell_description_mordekaisersyphon: Mordekaiser deals damage to enemies in a cone in front of him. For each unit hit, Mordekaiser's shield absorbs energy.
game_spell_description_namie: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
game_spell_description_namiq: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
game_spell_description_namir: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
game_spell_description_namiw: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
game_spell_description_nautilusgrandline: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
game_spell_description_nautilusravagestr: Nautilus' basic attacks deal increased physical damage and roots his target briefly. Staggering blow cannot trigger more than once every few seconds on the same target.
game_spell_description_netherblade: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.
game_spell_description_nexusblitz_soraka: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.

A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka Bot recovers health and gains Move Speed when moving away from enemy champions.
Soraka Bot fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.
Soraka Bot sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.
game_spell_description_nidaleetakedownat: Nidalee executes a powerful attack that deals increased damage to low Health and Hunted targets.
game_spell_description_nulllance: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.
game_spell_description_nunuesnowball: Nunu packs and throws a series of snowballs, damaging and slowing targets.  Willump roots those targets in place if they remain close for the spell's duration.
game_spell_description_nunuwsionturn: Willump rolls a giant snowball while Nunu steers!
game_spell_description_obduracy: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor (this amount is tripled while Granite Shield is active).
game_spell_description_olafaxethrow: Olaf throws an axe to target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and slowing their Move Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.
game_spell_description_olafaxethrowcast: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and slowing their Move Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.
game_spell_description_olaffrenziedstrik: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased, he gains Life Steal and has increased healing from all sources based on how much Health he is missing.
game_spell_description_olafragnarok: Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables.
game_spell_description_olafrecklessstrik: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.
game_spell_description_orianadetonatecom: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the Ball after a short delay.
game_spell_description_orianadissonancec: Orianna commands the Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.
game_spell_description_orianaizunacomman: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.
game_spell_description_orianaredactcomma: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.
game_spell_description_ornne: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.
game_spell_description_ornnq: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.
game_spell_description_ornnr: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.
game_spell_description_ornnw: Ornn advances, breathing fire and shielding himself. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.
game_spell_description_overdrive: Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased Movement and Attack Speed. He is temporarily slowed after the effect ends.
game_spell_description_phosphorusbomb: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.
game_spell_description_pickacard: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.
game_spell_description_poisontrail: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
game_spell_description_poppye: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.
game_spell_description_poppyq: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.
game_spell_description_poppyr: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.
game_spell_description_poppyw: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to stop enemy dashes around her and gain Move Speed.
game_spell_description_porolob: The Poro King periodically throws Poros around himself, dealing magic damage to enemies in an area where they land.
game_spell_description_porosnaxfeedtokin: The Poro King shoots out ice missiles which deal magic damage on impact.
The Poro King breathes fire that deals true damage to all units and turrets hits.
The Poro King leaps into the air and crashes down twice, knocking enemies away and dealing physical damage.
The Poro King shoots out Snax that attract Poros which will dash towards him, knocking enemies along with them.
game_spell_description_porothrowfollowup: Quickly travel to the unit you hit with your Poro, dealing true damage on arrival.
game_spell_description_pounce: Nidalee jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
game_spell_description_powerball: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
game_spell_description_powerfist: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double damage and pop his target up in the air.
game_spell_description_primalsurge: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
game_spell_description_puncturingtaunt: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.
game_spell_description_pykee: Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemies along its path.
game_spell_description_pykeq: Pyke either stabs enemies in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.
game_spell_description_pyker: Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists.
game_spell_description_pykew: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant Move Speed that decays over time.
game_spell_description_quinne: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Move Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target.
game_spell_description_quinnq: Quinn calls Valor to mark an enemy and hinder its vision before damaging all enemies in the immediate area.
game_spell_description_quinnr: Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed.  Ending the ability casts Skystrike, which deals damage to nearby enemies and marks champions as Vulnerable.
game_spell_description_quinnrfinale: Quinn and Valor deal physical damage to nearby enemies as Valor returns to the skies.
game_spell_description_quinnw: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Move Speed after she attacks a <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.
game_spell_description_quinnwenhanced: <mainText>Valor periodically marks enemies as <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font>. Quinn's first basic attack against <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> targets will deal bonus physical damage.</mainText>
game_spell_description_rakane: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.
game_spell_description_rakanq: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.
game_spell_description_rakanr: Gains Move Speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.
game_spell_description_reapthewhirlwind: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.
game_spell_description_reksaie:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
game_spell_description_reksaieburrowed: Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury.
game_spell_description_reksaiq:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.
game_spell_description_reksaiqburrowed:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit..
game_spell_description_reksair: Rek'Sai dives underground and leaps towards her target, dealing massive damage.
game_spell_description_reksaiw:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Move Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
game_spell_description_reksaiwburrowed:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Move Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
game_spell_description_renektoncleave: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
game_spell_description_renektonpredator: Renekton deals bonus damage to enemies under half health.
game_spell_description_renektonpreexecut: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
game_spell_description_renektonreignofth: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
game_spell_description_renektonsliceandd: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
game_spell_description_rengare:
Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.

Ferocity effect: roots the target.
game_spell_description_rengarq:
Rengar's next Attack brutally stabs his target for bonus damage.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage and grants Attack Speed.
game_spell_description_rengarr: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, <font color='#cd90ee'>Camouflaging</font> him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Move Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy without being in brush, reducing their armor.
game_spell_description_rengarw:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken.

Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.
game_spell_description_riftheraldbuffcou: This unit deals empowered damage to champions.
game_spell_description_riftwalk: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.
game_spell_description_rivenfeint: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.
game_spell_description_rivenfengshuiengi: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.
game_spell_description_rivenizunablade: Riven shoots a shockwave outward that deals damage to all enemies hit, increasing based on how much Health they are missing.
game_spell_description_rivenmartyr: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.
game_spell_description_riventricleave: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
game_spell_description_rocketgrab: Blitzcrank fires his right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to him.
game_spell_description_rumblecarpetbomb: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
