game_spell_description_rumbleflamethrowe: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
game_spell_description_rumblegrenade: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Move Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
game_spell_description_rumblemortar: Rumble launches mortars into the air dealing damage and slowing targets it hits.
game_spell_description_rumbleshield: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
game_spell_description_rupture: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
game_spell_description_ryzee: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that damages an enemy and debuffs them. Ryze's spells have additional effects against the debuffed enemy.
game_spell_description_ryzeq:
Passively, Ryze's other damaging spells reset Overload and charge runes that can be used to empower Overload.

On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If the max number of runes are charged, Ryze gains a brief burst of Move Speed.
game_spell_description_ryzer: Ryze creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.
game_spell_description_ryzew: Ryze traps a target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them and preventing them from moving.
game_spell_description_sadism: Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Move Speed and drastically increased Health Regeneration.
game_spell_description_seismicshard: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Move Speed for 4 seconds.
game_spell_description_sejuanie: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
game_spell_description_sejuaniq: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
game_spell_description_sejuanir: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
game_spell_description_sejuaniw: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.
game_spell_description_shene: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.
game_spell_description_shenq: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.
game_spell_description_shenr: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.
game_spell_description_shenw: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.
game_spell_description_shyvanadoubleatta:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front of Shyvana.

Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.
game_spell_description_shyvanafireball:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.
game_spell_description_shyvanafireballdr:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to the first enemy it encounters and leaves cinders on the target for 5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath engulfs all units in a cone in front of her.

Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to the first enemy it encounters and leaves cinders on the target that reduce their Armor for 5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath engulfs all units in a cone in front of her.
game_spell_description_shyvanaimmolatedr:
Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds. The Move Speed reduces over the duration of the spell.

Dragon Form: Burnout scorches the ground beneath it, enemies on the scorched earth continue to take damage.
game_spell_description_shyvanaimmolation:
Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Move Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.
game_spell_description_shyvanatransformc:
Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.
game_spell_description_sione: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging, slowing, and reducing the Armor of all enemies that it passes through.
game_spell_description_sionq: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.
game_spell_description_sionr: Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged.
game_spell_description_sionw: Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health.
game_spell_description_sivire: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.
game_spell_description_sivirq: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.
game_spell_description_sivirr: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Move Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.
game_spell_description_sivirw: Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.
game_spell_description_sivirwattack: Each of Sivir's attacks will bounce between targets, dealing reduced damage with each successive hit.
game_spell_description_sonae: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Move Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Move Speed on their next attack.
game_spell_description_sonapassivemissil: After 3 spell casts, Sona's next attack will deal 14 + 9 x lvl bonus magic damage in addition to an additional effect based on what song Sona last activated.
game_spell_description_sonaq: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.
game_spell_description_sonar: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.
game_spell_description_sonaw: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.
game_spell_description_sonawattackupgrad: Reduces the target's total damage output.
game_spell_description_sorakae: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.
game_spell_description_sorakaq: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers health and gains Move Speed when moving away from enemy champions.
game_spell_description_sorakar: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.
game_spell_description_sorakaw: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.
game_spell_description_sowthewind: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Move Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Move Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.
game_spell_description_staticfield: Passively causes lightning bolts to damage a nearby enemy. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to damage nearby enemies and silence them for 0.5 seconds, but doing so removes the passive lightning until Static Field becomes available again.
game_spell_description_summonerpororecal: Quickly travel to the Poro King's side.
game_spell_description_summonerporothrow: Toss a Poro at your enemies. If it hits, you can quickly travel to your target as a follow up.
game_spell_description_summonersnowurfsn: It's a snowball! It's a Poro! It's...uh...one of those.
Quickly travel to the unit you hit with Ultra Mark.
game_spell_description_swaindemonmode: Swain unleashes the power of the demon he conquered, causing his spells to devour the souls nearby targets.
game_spell_description_swaine: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits.
game_spell_description_swainpmovespell: Swain rips a Soul Fragment out of an immobilized enemy champion, dealing damage and pulling them towards him.
game_spell_description_swainq: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through targets killed. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.
game_spell_description_swainr: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from the 3 closest enemy champions. After draining enough health, Swain can cast Demonflare to end his transformation and decimate nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire.
game_spell_description_swainr2: Swain unleashes a nova of soulfire that deals increased damage based on how much health he drained. Swain ends his Demonic Ascension after casting this spell.
game_spell_description_swainw: Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment.
game_spell_description_swipe: Nidalee claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
game_spell_description_sylase: Sylas dashes and gains a shield. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits.
game_spell_description_sylasq:
Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies.

After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage and increasing the slow.
game_spell_description_sylasr: Sylas steals the enemy's ultimate ability and can cast it freely.
game_spell_description_sylasw: Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing execute based damage and healing himself against enemy champions.
game_spell_description_syndrae: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.
game_spell_description_syndraq: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.
game_spell_description_syndrar: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.
game_spell_description_syndraw: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Move Speed of enemies.
game_spell_description_takedown: Nidalee executes a powerful attack that deals increased damage to low Health and Hunted targets.
game_spell_description_taliyahe: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.
game_spell_description_taliyahq: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.
game_spell_description_taliyahr: Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
game_spell_description_taliyahwvc: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.
game_spell_description_talone: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.
game_spell_description_talonq: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.
game_spell_description_talonr: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Move Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.
game_spell_description_talonw: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.
game_spell_description_tarice: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.
game_spell_description_taricq: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.
game_spell_description_taricr: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.
game_spell_description_taricw:
Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.

Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.
game_spell_description_teemorcast: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.
game_spell_description_threshe: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
game_spell_description_threshpassivesoul: You have successfully broken through The Box. Your prize: Death.
game_spell_description_threshq: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
game_spell_description_threshr: Creates a perimeter which slows and damages enemies who walk through the walls.
game_spell_description_threshrpenta: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
game_spell_description_threshw: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
game_spell_description_timewarp: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Move Speed or increasing an ally's Move Speed for a short time.
game_spell_description_tremors2: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to nearby enemies and slowing them. Turrets take double damage from Tremors.
game_spell_description_tristanae: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
game_spell_description_tristanaq: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.
game_spell_description_tristanar: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.
game_spell_description_tristanaw: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.
game_spell_description_trundlecircle: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.
game_spell_description_trundledesecrate: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Move Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.
game_spell_description_trundlepain: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.
game_spell_description_trundletrollsmash: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.
game_spell_description_tryndameree: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
game_spell_description_tryndamereq: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.
game_spell_description_tryndamerew: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Move Speed reduced.
game_spell_description_twitchexpunge: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.
game_spell_description_twitchfullautomat: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.
game_spell_description_twitchgangsterful: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.
game_spell_description_twitchhideinshado:
Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Move Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.

When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.
game_spell_description_twitchult: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.
game_spell_description_twitchvenomcask: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.
game_spell_description_twoshivpoison: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their Move Speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage based on the target's missing Health.
game_spell_description_ufslash: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.
game_spell_description_undyingrage: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.
game_spell_description_unstoppableforce: Malphite ferociously charges at an enemy stunning him and knocking around any foes between him and his target.
game_spell_description_urgote: Urgot charges in a direction, trampling non-champion enemies and shielding himself. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way.
game_spell_description_urgotq: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.
game_spell_description_urgotr: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.
game_spell_description_urgotw: Urgot shields himself, slowing himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.
game_spell_description_varuse: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Move Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.
game_spell_description_varusr: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.
game_spell_description_varusw: Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health. Active: Varus empowers his next Piercing Arrow.
game_spell_description_vaynecondemn: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
game_spell_description_vayneinquisition: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, reduced Tumble cooldown, and triple the bonus Move Speed from Night Hunter.
game_spell_description_vaynesilveredbolt: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maximum Health as bonus true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)
game_spell_description_vaynetumble: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.
game_spell_description_veigarbalefulstri: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.
game_spell_description_veigardarkmatter: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.
game_spell_description_veigareventhorizo: After a brief delay Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, stunning enemies who pass through the perimeter.
game_spell_description_veigarr: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.
game_spell_description_velkoze: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
game_spell_description_velkozpassive: Vel'Koz's abilities apply <font color='#FFFFFF'>Organic Deconstruction</font> to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.
game_spell_description_velkozq: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
game_spell_description_velkozr: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.
game_spell_description_velkozresearchpro: Vel'Koz's basic abilities apply <font color='#FFFFFF'>Organic Deconstruction</font> to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.
game_spell_description_velkozw: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
game_spell_description_vie: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.
game_spell_description_viktorchaosstorm:
Viktor conjures an Arcane Storm on the field, dealing magic damage and interrupting enemy channels. The storm periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies and can be redirected by Viktor.

Augment: The Arcane Storm moves 25% faster, and whenever champions die after taking damage from it, the storm grows and increases in its duration.
game_spell_description_viktorchaosstormg: Viktor conjures an Arcane Storm on the field that he controls by magnetic manipulation.
game_spell_description_viktordeathray:
Viktor uses his biomechanical arm to fire a Hextech Ray that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.

Augment: An explosion follows the Hextech Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.
game_spell_description_viktorgravitonfie:
Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies caught within its radius. Enemies who stay in the field for too long become stunned.

Augment: Viktor's spells apply a slow to enemies.
game_spell_description_viktorpowertransf:
Viktor blasts an enemy unit with magic damage, which grants him a shield and empowers his next basic attack.

Augment: Siphon Power's shield is increased by 60% and Viktor gains bonus move speed after casting the Ability.
game_spell_description_viq: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.
game_spell_description_vir: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.
game_spell_description_viw: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.
game_spell_description_vladimire: Vladimir pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.
game_spell_description_vladimirhemoplagu: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit.
game_spell_description_vladimirq: Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.
game_spell_description_vladimirsanguinep: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.
game_spell_description_volley: Ashe fires 9 arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.
game_spell_description_vorpalspikes: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.
game_spell_description_warwicke: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.
game_spell_description_warwickq: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.
game_spell_description_warwickr: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus Move Speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.
game_spell_description_warwickw: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining Move Speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 25% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.
game_spell_description_wildcards: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
game_spell_description_xayahe: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.
game_spell_description_xayahq: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.
game_spell_description_xayahr: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.
game_spell_description_xayahw: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her Move Speed if she attacks a champion.
game_spell_description_xeratharcanebarra: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.
Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.
game_spell_description_xeratharcanopulse: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
game_spell_description_xerathlocusofpowe: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.
Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.
game_spell_description_xerathmagespear: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.
game_spell_description_xerathpassivebasi: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.
game_spell_description_xinzhaoe: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly and gaining a burst of Attack Speed. Audacious Charge's range is extended on Challenged targets.
game_spell_description_xinzhaoq: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
game_spell_description_xinzhaor: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao is impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.
game_spell_description_xinzhaow: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward, slowing affected enemies.
game_spell_description_yasuodashwrapper: Dashes through a unit, dealing escalating Magic Damage with each cast.
game_spell_description_yasuopassive: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is doubled. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.
game_spell_description_yasuoqw: A skillshot basic attack. After two successful Steel Tempests, the next fires a tornado that knocks enemies Airborne.
game_spell_description_yasuorknockupcomb: Moves to a unit and strikes them repeatedly for heavy damage. Can only be cast on Airborne targets.
game_spell_description_yasuowmovingwall: Creates a moving wall that blocks enemy projectiles.
game_spell_description_yoricke: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.
game_spell_description_yorickq: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target is a champion or large monster or if the target dies, a grave will be dug.
game_spell_description_yorickr: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
game_spell_description_yorickw: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.
game_spell_description_zace: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.
game_spell_description_zacq: Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.
game_spell_description_zacr: Zac flattens himself, making him immune to crowd control while slowing enemies standing on top of him. When he decides to bounce away, he will suck up any enemies standing on top of him, taking them for a ride.
game_spell_description_zacw: Zac's body erupts, damaging nearby enemies.
game_spell_description_zedmarker: Zed's first basic attack on a target below 50% Health deals 8% maximum Health as Magic Damage.
game_spell_description_zedr2: Zed switches places with his shadow.
game_spell_description_zedw2: Zed switches places with his shadow.
game_spell_description_zephyrslamentburn: Liandry's Torment is burning this unit, dealing magic damage based on maximum Health over time. This effect's damage is increased if the burning unit is slowed, stunned, taunted, feared, immobilized, or otherwise has their movement impaired.
game_spell_description_ziggse: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing. Successive mine detonations on the same target deal reduced damage.
game_spell_description_ziggspassiveattac: Every 12 seconds Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.
game_spell_description_ziggsq: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.
game_spell_description_ziggsr: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.
game_spell_description_ziggsw: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.
game_spell_description_zileanq: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.
game_spell_description_zileanw: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.
game_spell_description_zoee: Causes the target to become drowsy, then fall asleep. The first source of damage that breaks the sleep is doubled, up to a cap.
game_spell_description_zoepassive: Zoe's next basic attack after casting a spell deals bonus magic damage.
game_spell_description_zoeq: Zoe fires a missile that she can redirect in flight. Deals more damage the longer it flies in a straight line.
game_spell_description_zoerv4: Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.
game_spell_description_zoew: Zoe can pick up the remnants of enemy summoner spell and active item casts and cast them once herself. Whenever she casts a summoner spell, she gains 3 missiles that fire at the nearest target.
game_spell_description_zyrae: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Move Speed.
game_spell_description_zyraeplantattack: Vine Lashers deal damage and slow enemies.
game_spell_description_zyrap: Seeds spawn around Zyra periodically, becoming faster with level. Zyra can cast Deadly Spines or Grasping Roots near seeds to grow plants, who fight for Zyra.
game_spell_description_zyraq: Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.
game_spell_description_zyraqplantmissile: Thorn Spitters deal magic damage from afar.
game_spell_description_zyrar: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts. Plants within the thicket are enraged.
game_spell_description_zyraw: Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Zyra can store multiple seeds at once, and killing enemies reduces Rampant Growth's recharge time.
game_spell_displayname_ivernpnexusblitz: <titleLeft>Enemy of the Forest</titleLeft><mainText>It's time for Ivern's revenge. Ivern can damage monsters, and they can damage him.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: Ivern the Cruel</postScriptLeft>
game_spell_displayname_mordekaiserchildr: Children of the Grave (Monsters and Champions)
Children of the Grave (Monsters, Dragon and Champions)
game_spell_displayname_mordekaiserp: Master of the Realm of the Dead
game_spell_kayn_e_main_0:
Kayn gains @Effect1Amount@% Move Speed, becomes Ghosted, and can move through Terrain for @Effect2Amount@ seconds. When he first enters terrain, he restores @TotalHealing@ Health.

Being Immobilized and spending more than @Effect3Amount@ consecutive seconds outside of Terrain ends this Ability early.

Shadow Assassin: Gain @Effect5Amount@% Move Speed, Slow immunity, and reduce the Cooldown to @AssassinCDReduction@ seconds.
game_spell_kayn_e_main_1:
Kayn gains @Effect1Amount@% Move Speed, becomes Ghosted, and can move through Terrain for @Effect2Amount@ seconds. When he first enters terrain, he restores @TotalHealing@ Health.

Being Immobilized and spending more than @Effect3Amount@ consecutive seconds outside of Terrain ends this Ability early.

Shadow Assassin: Gain @Effect5Amount@% Move Speed, Slow immunity, and reduce the Cooldown to @AssassinCDReduction@ seconds.
game_spell_kayn_e_main_2:
Kayn gains @Effect1Amount@% Move Speed, becomes Ghosted, and can move through Terrain for @Effect2Amount@ seconds. When he first enters terrain, he restores @TotalHealing@ Health.

Being Immobilized and spending more than @Effect3Amount@ consecutive seconds outside of Terrain ends this Ability early.
game_spell_kayn_p_main_0:
Kayn the Shadow Assassin fights Rhaast the Darkin Slayer for control. One will win, the other will die.

Damaging ranged champions charges the Shadow Assassin, and damaging melee champions charges the Darkin Slayer. At full charge, Kayn can permanently transform at his fountain.

Shadow Assassin: After entering combat Kayn's Attacks and Abilities deal an additional @KaynAssBonusDamage@ damage dealt magic damage for 3 seconds. This only occurs if Kayn has been out of combat for @PAmpCooldownAss@ seconds or used Umbral Trespass.

Darkin Slayer: Kayn heals for @KaynSlayerHealing@ of physical damage dealt to champions.
game_spell_kayn_p_main_1:
The Shadow Assassin has won.

Shadow Assassin: After entering combat Kayn's Attacks and Abilities deal an additional @KaynAssBonusDamage@ damage dealt magic damage for 3 seconds. This only occurs if Kayn has been out of combat for @PAmpCooldownAss@ seconds or used Umbral Trespass.
game_spell_kayn_p_main_2:
The Darkin Slayer has won.

Darkin Slayer: Kayn heals for @KaynSlayerHealing@ of physical damage dealt to champions.
game_spell_kayn_q_main_0:
Kayn dashes then spins his scythe, dealing @TotalDamage@ physical damage to enemies he passes through, then deals the damage again to nearby enemies.

Darkin Slayer: Instead deal @DarkinFlatDamage@ plus @DarkinPercentDamage@ max Health physical damage.
game_spell_kayn_q_main_1: Kayn dashes then spins his scythe, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage> to enemies he passes through, then deals the damage again to nearby enemies.
game_spell_kayn_q_main_2:
Kayn dashes then spins his scythe, dealing @TotalDamage@ physical damage to enemies he passes through, then deals the damage again to nearby enemies.

Darkin Slayer: Instead deal @DarkinFlatDamage@ plus @DarkinPercentDamage@ max Health physical damage.
game_spell_kayn_r_main_0:
Kayn infests an enemy champion he has recently damaged, becoming untargetable for up to @Effect4Amount@ seconds. Reactivate to end this effect early. When Umbral Trespass ends, the target takes @Effect1Amount@ (+@CharBonusPhysical@) physical damage.
Shadow Assassin: Gains extra range for entering and exiting Kayn's target and refreshes The Darkin Scythe on exit.

Darkin: Deals percent maximum health damage and heals for a percentage of target maximum health.
game_spell_kayn_r_main_1: Kayn infests an enemy champion <specialRules>he has recently damaged</specialRules>, becoming untargetable for up to @Effect4Amount@ seconds. <font color='#ffffff'>Reactivate</font> to end this effect early. When Umbral Trespass ends, <font color='#8484fb'>the cooldown of The Darkin Scythe is reset</font>, the target takes <physicalDamage>@Effect1Amount@ <scaleAD>(+@CharBonusPhysical@)</scaleAD> physical damage</physicalDamage> and Kayn is propelled an extended distance from his victim.
game_spell_kayn_r_main_2: Rhaast infests an enemy champion <specialRules>he has recently damaged</specialRules>, becoming untargetable for up to @Effect4Amount@ seconds. <font color='#ffffff'>Reactivate</font> to end this effect early. When Umbral Trespass ends, the target takes <scaleAD>@f5@%</scaleAD> of <font color='#fe5c50'>their maximum health</font> as <physicalDamage>physical damage</physicalDamage> and Rhaast <font color='#fe5c50'>heals for </font><scaleAD>@f6@%</scaleAD><font color='#fe5c50'> of his target's maximum health.</font>
game_spell_kayn_w_maintext_0:
Kayn swipes his scythe upward, dealing @TotalDamage@ physical damage and Slowing enemies hit by @Effect3Amount*-100@%, decaying over @Effect5Amount@ seconds.

Shadow Assassin: Kayn can move while using this Ability and increases its range.

Darkin Slayer: Additionally Knocks Up enemies hit for @Effect2Amount@ second.
game_spell_kayn_w_maintext_1:
Kayn swipes his scythe upward, dealing @TotalDamage@ physical damage and Slowing enemies hit by @Effect3Amount*-100@%, decaying over @Effect5Amount@ seconds.

Shadow Assassin: Kayn can move while using this Ability and increases its range.
game_spell_kayn_w_maintext_2:
Kayn swipes his scythe upward, dealing @TotalDamage@ physical damage and Slowing enemies hit by @Effect3Amount*-100@%, decaying over @Effect5Amount@ seconds.

Darkin Slayer: Additionally Knocks Up enemies hit for @Effect2Amount@ second.

generatedtip_inheritedspell_dogdashattac: Nidalee jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
generatedtip_inheritedspell_elisespidere: Ascends into the air, briefly becoming untargetable, and then descends upon an enemy.
generatedtip_inheritedspell_elisespiderq:
Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.

Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.
generatedtip_inheritedspell_ksanteq3_des:
K'Sante strikes, damaging and slowing enemies in a short line.

On hit, grants a stack of Ntofo Strikes. At 2 stacks, K'Sante fires a shockwave that pulls enemies in.

When All Out, cooldown is reduced.
generatedtip_inheritedspell_pounce_descr: Nidalee jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
generatedtip_inheritedspell_swipe_descri: Nidalee claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
generatedtip_inheritedspell_takedown_des: Nidalee executes a powerful attack that deals increased damage to low Health and Hunted targets.
generatedtip_inheritedspell_yuumiwendwra: Yuumi can reactivate this spell to dash to another ally champion, or to detach from her current ally.
generatedtip_passive_akaliqspellpassive_: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next Attack with bonus range and damage.
generatedtip_spell_aatroxe_description: Passively, Aatrox heals when damaging enemy champions. On activation, he dashes in a direction.
generatedtip_spell_aatroxq_description: Aatrox slams his greatsword down, dealing physical damage. He can swing three times, each with a different area of effect.
generatedtip_spell_aatroxr_description: Aatrox unleashes his demonic form, fearing nearby enemy minions and gaining attack damage, increased healing, and Move Speed. If he gets a takedown, this effect is extended.
generatedtip_spell_aatroxw_description: Aatrox smashes the ground, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. Champions and large monsters have to leave the impact area quickly or they will be dragged to the center and take the damage again.
generatedtip_spell_ahrie_description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, instantly stopping movement abilities and causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.
generatedtip_spell_ahriq_description: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back.
generatedtip_spell_ahrir_description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown, and gains additional recasts when taking down enemy champions.
generatedtip_spell_ahriw_description: Ahri gains a brief burst of Move Speed and releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
generatedtip_spell_akalie_description: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing magic damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing additional damage.
generatedtip_spell_akaliq_description: Akali throws out five kunai, dealing damage based on her bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power and slowing.
generatedtip_spell_akalir_description: Akali leaps in a direction, damaging enemies she strikes. Re-cast: Akali dashes in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes.
generatedtip_spell_akaliw_description: Akali drops a cover of smoke and briefly gains Move Speed. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes invisible and unable to be selected by enemy spells and attacks. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.
generatedtip_spell_akshane_description: Akshan fires a grappling hook into terrain then swings around it, repeatedly firing at the nearest enemy while swinging. He can jump off early or gets knocked off when colliding with champions or terrain.
generatedtip_spell_akshanq_description: Akshan throws a boomerang that deals damage going out and coming back, extending its range each time it hits an enemy.
generatedtip_spell_akshanr_description: Akshan locks onto an enemy champion and starts storing bullets. When released, he fires all stored bullets, dealing damage based on missing health to the first champion, minion, or structure hit.
generatedtip_spell_akshanw_description:
Akshan passively marks enemy champions as Scoundrels when they kill his ally champions. If Akshan kills a Scoundrel, he resurrects the allies they killed, gains bonus gold, and clears all marks.

When activated, Akshan enters camouflage and gains Move Speed and Mana Regen while moving towards Scoundrels. Akshan loses the camouflage quickly while he is not in brush or near terrain.
generatedtip_spell_alistare_description: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit collision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.
generatedtip_spell_alphastrike_descripti: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.
generatedtip_spell_ambessae_description: Ambessa whips her twin drakehounds around herself, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Initiating Drakehound's Step from this ability causes her to strike a second time at the end of its dash.
generatedtip_spell_ambessaq_description: Ambessa sweeps her twin drakehounds in a semicircle in front of her, dealing bonus damage to enemies hit by the blades. Striking an enemy will transform the next cast of this ability for a short period of time, causing her to slam her twin drakehounds down in a line in front of her, dealing bonus damage to the first enemy hit.
generatedtip_spell_ambessar_description: Ambessa blinks to the farthest enemy champion in a line of her choosing and suppresses them upon her arrival. She then slams the enemy into the ground where they take damage and are stunned.
generatedtip_spell_ambessaw_description: Ambessa gains a shield, briefly braces herself, and then slams the ground to damage nearby enemies. If she blocked any non-minion damage while bracing herself, this ability will deal increased damage.
generatedtip_spell_anniee_description: Grants Annie or an ally a shield, a burst of Move Speed, and damages enemies who strike her with attacks or spells.
generatedtip_spell_annieq_description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
generatedtip_spell_annier_description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
generatedtip_spell_anniew_description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
generatedtip_spell_apheliosr_description: Fire a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes on enemy champions. Applies the unique effect of Aphelios' main-hand gun.
generatedtip_spell_asheq_description: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.
generatedtip_spell_ashespiritofthehawk_d: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.
generatedtip_spell_aspectofthecougar_des: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.
generatedtip_spell_atakhan_combatspell_d: Atakhan casts demonic magic:<li> Blasting the living with multiple bolts of dark energy<li> Slashing repeatedly around himself
generatedtip_spell_auraofdespair_descrip: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curses</font> refreshed.
generatedtip_spell_aurelionsole_descript: Aurelion Sol summons a black hole, damaging enemies and slowly pulling them toward its center. This ability grants Stardust each time an enemy dies within the black hole and for each second an enemy champion is caught inside it. The center of the black hole executes enemies who are below a certain percentage of their maximum health. Stardust increases Singularity's area as well as the execution threshold.
generatedtip_spell_aurelionsolq_descript: Aurelion Sol channels his dragon breath for a few seconds, damaging the first enemy hit and splashing reduced damage onto nearby enemies. Each second the breath is channeled directly at an enemy will deal bonus damage, which is improved by the amount of Stardust that's been collected. This ability collects Stardust if the target is a champion.
generatedtip_spell_aurelionsolr_descript:
Falling Star: Aurelion Sol crashes a star into the earth. This impact deals magic damage and stuns enemies while also granting Stardust for each enemy champion it hits. Gathering enough Stardust transforms Aurelion Sol's next Falling Star into The Skies Descend.

The Skies Descend: Aurelion Sol drags a giant star down from the heavens with an increased impact zone and increased damage, knocking up enemies rather than stunning them. A shockwave then spreads from the edge of the impact zone, which damages and slows the enemies it hits. Stardust increases the impact area of both Falling Star and The Skies Descend.
generatedtip_spell_aurelionsolw_descript:
Aurelion Sol flies over terrain in a targeted direction. While in this state, he can cast other abilities. Breath of Light no longer has a cooldown or maximum channel duration and deals increased damage while flying.

Astral Flight's remaining cooldown is reduced whenever an enemy champion dies after being recently damaged by Aurelion Sol.

Stardust increases Astral Flight's maximum range.
generatedtip_spell_aurorae_description: Aurora converges the realms, sending out a blast of spirit magic that damages and slows enemies before Aurora hops backward to safety.
generatedtip_spell_auroraq_description: Aurora sends out a missile that curses any enemies it hits. She can then recast the ability to draw active curses back toward herself, damaging foes who are hit along the way.
generatedtip_spell_aurorar_description: Aurora leaps in a direction of her choosing, releasing a shockwave that damages and slows any enemies it hits. Afterward, she creates an area that slows enemies within it and allows Aurora to teleport from one side of the area to the other.
generatedtip_spell_auroraw_description: Aurora leaps in a direction of her choosing, entering the spirit realm upon landing, becoming invisible, and gaining Move Speed for a short duration of time.
generatedtip_spell_azirewrapper_descript: Azir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.
generatedtip_spell_azirqwrapper_descript: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.
generatedtip_spell_azirr_description: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
generatedtip_spell_azirw_description: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line.
generatedtip_spell_bandagetoss_descripti: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
generatedtip_spell_barde_description: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.

generatedtip_spell_yunaraq_description: Yunara gains Attack Speed, bonus damage On-Hit, and her Attacks spread to nearby enemies.
generatedtip_spell_yunarar_description: Yunara enters a Transcendent State that upgrades her basic Abilities.
generatedtip_spell_yunaraw_description: Yunara fires a spinning prayer bead that deals damage and slows enemies. While in her Transcendent State she instead fires off a laser that deals damage and slows enemies.
generatedtip_spell_yunaraw_displayname: Arc of Judgment | Arc of Ruin
generatedtip_spell_yunaraw_pickchoicedes: Arc of Judgment | Arc of Ruin@SpellModifierPickDescriptionAppend@
generatedtip_spell_yunaraw_pickchoicenam: Arc of Judgment | Arc of Ruin
generatedtip_spell_yuumie_description: Shields Yuumi and boosts Move Speed and Attack Speed. If she's attached, she passes it to her ally instead.
generatedtip_spell_yuumieurf_description: Shields Yuumi and boosts Move Speed and Attack Speed. If she's attached, she passes it to her ally instead.
generatedtip_spell_yuumiq_description:
Yuumi fires a missile, dealing damage and slowing first target hit. It deals bonus damage and an enchanced slow if it takes at least 1.35 seconds to get to its target. While on her Best Friend, the slow is always enhanced and grants bonus On-Hit damage to her ally.

While Attached, the missile can be controlled with your cursor for a brief period.
generatedtip_spell_yuumiqskillshot_descr:
Yuumi fires a missile, dealing damage and slowing first target hit. It deals bonus damage and an enchanced slow if it takes at least 1.35 seconds to get to its target. While on her Best Friend, the slow is always enhanced and grants bonus On-Hit damage to her ally.

While Attached, the missile can be controlled with your cursor for a brief period.
generatedtip_spell_yuumir_description: Yuumi channels five waves that damage enemies and heal allies. Yuumi can move, attach, and cast Zoomies! while channeling. While on her Best Friend, this spell also follows her mouse.
generatedtip_spell_yuumiw_description: Yuumi dashes to a target ally, becoming untargetable from everything except turrets. While on her Best Friend, she gains Heal & Shield Power and grants her Ally On-Hit healing.
generatedtip_spell_yuumiwally_descriptio: Yuumi can reactivate this spell to dash to another ally champion, or to detach from her current ally.
generatedtip_spell_yuumiwend_description: Yuumi can reactivate this spell to dash to another ally champion, or to detach from her current ally.
generatedtip_spell_zace_description: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.
generatedtip_spell_zacq_description: Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.
generatedtip_spell_zacr_description: Zac bounces four times, knocking up enemies hit and slowing them.
generatedtip_spell_zacw_description: Zac explodes outward towards nearby enemies, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage.
generatedtip_spell_zede_description: Zed and his Shadows slash, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Enemies hit by a Shadow's slash are slowed.
generatedtip_spell_zedq_description:
Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens.

Each shuriken deals damage to every enemy hit.
generatedtip_spell_zedr_description: Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds the mark triggers, repeating a portion of all the damage Zed dealt to the target while they were marked.
generatedtip_spell_zedw_description:
Passive: Zed gains energy whenever he and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability. Energy can only be gained once per cast ability.

Active: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for a few seconds. Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.
generatedtip_spell_zerie_description: Zeri dashes a short distance and energizes her next 3 shots of Burst Fire, causing them to pierce through enemies. She will vault and grind over any terrain she touches.
generatedtip_spell_zeriq_description: Burst Fire shoots a burst of 7 rounds that deal attack damage to the first enemy hit. This Ability is treated as an Attack.
generatedtip_spell_zerir_description: Zeri discharges a nova of electricity and overcharges herself, gaining increased damage and stacking Move Speed that refreshes and gets stronger every time she hits an enemy champion. While overcharged, Burst fire becomes a faster triple shot that chains lightning between enemies.
generatedtip_spell_zeriw_description: Zeri fires an electric pulse that slows and damages the first enemy hit. If the pulse hits a wall it expands into a long range laser.
generatedtip_spell_ziggse_description: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing. Successive mine detonations on the same target deal reduced damage.
generatedtip_spell_ziggsq_description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.
generatedtip_spell_ziggsr_description: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.
generatedtip_spell_ziggsw_description:
Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after a delay, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.
generatedtip_spell_zileanq_description: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.
generatedtip_spell_zileanw_description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.
generatedtip_spell_zoee_description: Causes the target to become drowsy, then fall asleep. While asleep, the target's Magic Resist is reduced. The first source of damage that breaks the sleep is doubled, up to a cap.
generatedtip_spell_zoeq_description: Zoe fires a missile that she can redirect in flight. Deals more damage the longer it flies in a straight line.
generatedtip_spell_zoer_description: Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.
generatedtip_spell_zoew_description: Zoe can pick up the remnants of enemy summoner spell and active item casts and cast them once herself. Whenever she casts a summoner spell, she gains 3 missiles that fire at the nearest target.
generatedtip_spell_zyrae_description: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Move Speed.
generatedtip_spell_zyraeplant_descriptio: Vine Lashers are grown from Zyra's Seeds by her Grasping Roots spell. They engage her enemies with a slowing whip attack.
generatedtip_spell_zyraq_description: Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.
generatedtip_spell_zyraqplant_descriptio: Thorn Spitters are grown from Zyra's seeds by her Deadly Spines spell. They shoot little `friendliness pellets` at her enemies.
generatedtip_spell_zyrar_description: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts. Plants within the thicket are enraged.
generatedtip_spell_zyraw_description: Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Zyra can store multiple seeds at once, and killing enemies reduces Rampant Growth's recharge time.
generatedtip_spellaphelios_aphelioscalib:
Aphelios has 5 different activated abilities, based on his main-hand weapon:

Calibrum (Rifle): Long range shot that marks its target for a long-range follow-up attack.
Severum (Scythe Pistol): Run fast while attacking nearby enemies with both weapons.
Gravitum (Cannon): Root all enemies slowed by this weapon.
Infernum (Flamethrower): Blast enemies in a cone and attack them with your off-hand weapon.
Crescendum (Chakram): Deploy a sentry that shoots your off-hand weapon.
generatedtip_spellaphelios_apheliose_des: Aphelios has no third ability. This slot shows the next weapon Alune will give him. Weapon order begins fixed but may change over game time -- when a weapon is out of ammo it goes to the end of the order.
generatedtip_spellaphelios_apheliosw_des: Aphelios swaps his main-hand gun with his off-hand gun, replacing his basic attack and activated ability.
generatedtip_spellkayn_kaynq_description: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.
generatedtip_spellkayn_kaynr_description: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.
generatedtip_summonerspell_porothrowfoll: Quickly travel to the unit you hit with your Poro, dealing true damage on arrival.
generatedtip_summonerspell_s12_summonert: After a brief channel, become untargetable and travel to an allied unit. Upgrades into Unleashed Teleport, which significantly increases travel speed.
generatedtip_summonerspell_summonerboost: Removes all disables (excluding suppression and airborne) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and gives Tenacity.
generatedtip_summonerspell_summonerdot_d: Deals true damage over time to target enemy champion and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.
generatedtip_summonerspell_summonerexhau: Slows target enemy champion and reduces their damage dealt.
generatedtip_summonerspell_summonerflash: Teleports you a short distance toward your cursor.
generatedtip_summonerspell_summonerhaste: Gain Move Speed and ignore unit collision for the duration.
generatedtip_summonerspell_summonerheal_: Restores Health and grants Move Speed to you and target allied champion.
generatedtip_summonerspell_summonermana_: Restores your and ally champion's Mana.
generatedtip_summonerspell_summonerporor: Quickly travel to the Poro King's side.
generatedtip_summonerspell_summonerporot: Toss a Poro at your enemies. If it hits, you can quickly travel to your target as a follow up.
generatedtip_summonerspell_summonersmite: Deals true damage to a monster or minion.
generatedtip_summonerspell_summonersnowb: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.
generatedtip_summonerspell_summonersnowu: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.
generatedtip_summonerspell_summonertelep: After a brief channel, become untargetable and travel to an allied unit. Upgrades into Unleashed Teleport, which significantly increases travel speed.
npe2018_structuresspell: Structures are immune to most Spells
options_hotkeys_quickcastwithindicator_c: Cast the pressed spell upon pressing another spell
perk_long_desc_unsealedspellbook:
Swap one of your equipped Summoner Spells to a new, single use Summoner Spell. Each unique Summoner Spell you swap to permanently decreases your swap cooldown by @ShardRechargeReductionSeconds@s (initial swap cooldown is @f3@ seconds).

Your first swap becomes available at @ShardFirstMinutes@ mins.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.
After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap @NumSummonersBeforeRepeat@ more times before the first can be selected again.
Smite damage increases after two Summoner Spell swaps.
perk_short_desc_unsealedspellbook: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.
spell_aatroxe_description: Aatrox dashes forward, gaining Attack Damage.
spell_aatroxe_summary: Passively, Aatrox heals when damaging enemy champions. On activation, he dashes in a direction.
spell_aatroxpassive_summary: Periodically, Aatrox's next basic attack deals bonus <magicDamage>magic damage</magicDamage> and heals him, based on the target's max health.
spell_aatroxq_description: Aatrox prepares a huge swing of his sword and slams it in front of him.
spell_aatroxq_summary: Aatrox slams his greatsword down, dealing physical damage. He can swing three times, each with a different area of effect.
spell_aatroxr_description: Aatrox unleashes his demonic wings, gaining Attack Damage and Move Speed, and reviving instead of taking lethal damage.
spell_aatroxr_summary: Aatrox unleashes his demonic form, fearing nearby enemy minions and gaining attack damage, increased healing, and Move Speed. If he gets a takedown, this effect is extended.
spell_aatroxw_description: Aatrox launches a missile, causing the first enemy hit to be pulled back after a delay.
spell_aatroxw_summary: Aatrox smashes the ground, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. Champions and large monsters have to leave the impact area quickly or they will be dragged to the center and take the damage again.
spell_ahrie_summary: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.
spell_ahrifoxfire_summary: Ahri gains a brief burst of Move Speed and releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
spell_ahriorbofdeception_summary: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back.
spell_ahriq_summary:
Ahri throws out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back.

When Ahri strikes 9 enemies with her abilities, Orb of Deception also heals her.
spell_ahrir_summary: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging 3 nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions). Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.
spell_ahriseduce_summary: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, instantly stopping movement abilities and causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.
spell_ahritumble_summary: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown, and gains additional recasts when taking down enemy champions.
spell_ahriw_summary: Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
spell_akalie_summary: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing magic damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing additional damage.
spell_akalip_summary: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next Attack with bonus range and damage.
spell_akaliq_summary: Akali throws out five kunai, dealing damage based on her bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power and slowing.
spell_akalir_summary: Akali leaps in a direction, damaging enemies she strikes. Re-cast: Akali dashes in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes.
spell_akaliw_summary: Akali drops a cover of smoke and briefly gains Move Speed. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes invisible and unable to be selected by enemy spells and attacks. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.
spell_akshane_summary: Akshan fires a grappling hook into terrain then swings around it, repeatedly firing at the nearest enemy while swinging. He can jump off early or gets knocked off when colliding with champions or terrain.
spell_akshanpassive_summary:
Every three hits from Akshan's Attacks and Abilities deals bonus damage and grants him a Shield if the target was a champion.

When Akshan Attacks, he fires an additional Attack for reduced damage. If he cancels the additional Attack, he instead gains Move Speed.
spell_akshanq_summary: Akshan throws a boomerang that deals damage going out and coming back, extending its range each time it hits an enemy.
spell_akshanr_summary: Akshan locks onto an enemy champion and starts storing bullets. When released, he fires all stored bullets, dealing damage based on missing health to the first champion, minion, or structure hit.
spell_akshanw_summary:
Akshan passively marks enemy champions as Scoundrels when they kill his ally champions. If Akshan kills a Scoundrel, he resurrects the allies they killed, gains bonus gold, and clears all marks.

When activated, Akshan enters camouflage and gains Move Speed and Mana Regen while moving towards Scoundrels. Akshan loses the camouflage quickly while he is not in brush or near terrain.
spell_alistare_summary: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit collision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.
spell_alistarpassive_summary: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself all nearby allied champions.
spell_alphastrike_summary: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.
spell_ambessae_summary: Ambessa whips her twin drakehounds around herself, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Initiating Drakehound's Step from this ability causes her to strike a second time at the end of its dash.
spell_ambessap_summary: Entering an attack or movement command while casting an ability will cause Ambessa to dash a short distance once the ability is cast, granting her next attack bonus range, damage, and attack speed, and refunding energy.
spell_ambessaq_summary: Ambessa sweeps her twin drakehounds in a semicircle in front of her, dealing bonus damage to enemies hit by the blades. Striking an enemy will transform the next cast of this ability for a short period of time, causing her to slam her twin drakehounds down in a line in front of her, dealing bonus damage to the first enemy hit.
spell_ambessar_summary: Ambessa blinks to the farthest enemy champion in a line of her choosing and suppresses them upon her arrival. She then slams the enemy into the ground where they take damage and are stunned.
spell_ambessaw_summary: Ambessa gains a shield, briefly braces herself, and then slams the ground to damage nearby enemies. If she blocked any non-minion damage while bracing herself, this ability will deal increased damage.
spell_amumup_summary: Amumu's basic attacks <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font> his enemies, causing them to take bonus true damage from incoming magic damage.
spell_anniee_summary: Grants Annie or an ally a shield, a burst of Move Speed, and damages enemies who strike her with attacks or spells.
spell_anniepassive_summary:
After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target.

Annie begins the game and respawns with Pyromania available.
spell_annieq_summary: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
spell_annier_summary: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
spell_anniew_summary: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
spell_aphelioscalibrumq_summary:
Aphelios has 5 different activated abilities, based on his main-hand weapon:

Calibrum (Rifle): Long range shot that marks its target for a long-range follow-up attack.
Severum (Scythe Pistol): Run fast while attacking nearby enemies with both weapons.
Gravitum (Cannon): Root all enemies slowed by this weapon.
Infernum (Flamethrower): Blast enemies in a cone and attack them with your off-hand weapon.
Crescendum (Chakram): Deploy a sentry that shoots your off-hand weapon.
spell_apheliose_long_1:
{{ ApheliosGun_LoreName_1 }} Passive: Aphelios gains @spell.ApheliosCalibrumQ:BonusRange@ Attack Range.

Abilities that use {{ ApheliosGun_LoreName_1 }} mark targets for @spell.ApheliosCalibrumQ:MarkDuration@ seconds, revealing them. Aphelios can Attack a marked target from long range with his off-hand weapon, causing all nearby marks to be consumed, dealing an additional @spell.ApheliosCalibrumQ:BonusDamagePerMark@ physical damage each to the main target.
spell_apheliose_long_2: <font color='#e6005c'>{{ ApheliosGun_LoreName_2 }} <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive></font> Attacks using this weapon restore <healing>@spell.ApheliosSeverumQ:HealAmount@</healing> of the damage dealt as Health, and Abilities using it restore <healing>@spell.ApheliosSeverumQ:HealAmountSpell@</healing>. This weapon can heal Aphelios over his max Health, granting him up to <shield>@spell.ApheliosSeverumQ:MaxShield@ Shield</shield>.
spell_apheliose_long_3: <font color='#1a75ff'>{{ApheliosGun_LoreName_3}} <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive></font> Aphelios' Attacks deal <physicalDamage>@spell.ApheliosInfernumQ:AttackDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage> to the primary target and <physicalDamage>@spell.ApheliosInfernumQ:SecondaryTargetPenalty@ damage</physicalDamage> to enemies behind them.
spell_apheliose_long_4:
{{ApheliosGun_LoreName_4}} Passive: Aphelios' Attacks ricochet off their target and back to Aphelios. Aphelios can Attack again immediately after he catches the ricochet.

Other Abilities that use {{ ApheliosGun_LoreName_4 }} create {{ ApheliosGun_LoreName_4b }} which each deal bonus damage when Aphelios attacks.
spell_apheliose_long_5: <font color='#a64dff'>{{ApheliosGun_LoreName_5}}</font> <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Aphelios' Attacks <status>Slow</status> targets by @spell.ApheliosGravitumQ:SlowAmountInitial@, decaying over @spell.ApheliosGravitumQ:SlowDuration@ seconds.
spell_apheliose_summary: Aphelios has no third ability. This slot shows the next weapon Alune will give him. Weapon order begins fixed but may change over game time -- when a weapon is out of ammo it goes to the end of the order.
spell_apheliosp_gunshortdesc_4: {{ ApheliosGun_Name_4 }}: High damage at close range.
spell_apheliosp_summary: Aphelios wields 5 Lunari Weapons made by his sister Alune. He has access to two at a time: one main-hand and one off-hand. Each weapon has a unique Basic Attack and Ability. Attacks and abilities consume a weapon's ammo. When out of ammo, Aphelios discards the weapon and Alune summons the next of the 5.
spell_apheliosq_offhand_description_0: This Ability does not use Aphelios' off-hand weapon.
spell_apheliosq_offhand_description_1: Marks targets hit by this weapon, granting vision of them. Attack marked targets from long range with your off-hand weapon. Consumes all marks for <physicalDamage>@spell.ApheliosCalibrumQ:BonusDamagePerMark@ bonus physical damage</physicalDamage> each.
spell_apheliosq_offhand_description_2: Heals Aphelios for <healing><scaleLevel>@spell.ApheliosSeverumQ:HealAmountSpell@</scaleLevel></healing> of its damage dealt.
spell_apheliosq_offhand_description_3: This weapon's attacks deal 110% damage and explodes into a cone.
spell_apheliosq_offhand_description_4: Creates a {{ ApheliosGun_LoreName_4b }} for each enemy hit with this weapon. These return to Aphelios and orbit around him for @spell.ApheliosCrescendumQ:MiniBuffDuration@ seconds.
spell_apheliosq_offhand_description_5: Slows targets by @spell.ApheliosGravitumQ:SlowAmountInitial@, decaying over @spell.ApheliosGravitumQ:SlowDuration@ seconds.
spell_apheliosr_summary: Fire a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes on enemy champions. Applies the unique effect of Aphelios' main-hand gun.
spell_apheliosr_weaponmod_1: {{ ApheliosGun_LoreName_1 }} Bonus: Marks added this way deal an additional @CalibrumRMarkBonusDamage@ physical damage each when consumed.
spell_apheliosr_weaponmod_2: {{ ApheliosGun_LoreName_2 }} Bonus: Aphelios restores @SeverumRHealBonus@ Health.
spell_apheliosr_weaponmod_3: {{ ApheliosGun_LoreName_3 }} Bonus: The moonlight blast deals an additional @InfernumRBonusDamage@ physical damage, and the subsequent Attacks explode, each dealing @InfernumRPenalty@ of their damage to surrounding targets.
spell_apheliosr_weaponmod_4: {{ ApheliosGun_LoreName_4 }} Bonus: Summons an additional @CrescendumRBonusMinis@ {{ ApheliosGun_LoreName_4b }}.
spell_apheliosr_weaponmod_5: {{ ApheliosGun_LoreName_5 }} Bonus: Slow strength increased to @GravitumRBonusSlow@. {{ Spell_ApheliosQ_Name_51 }}'s Root effect is increased to @GravitumRRootDuration@ seconds against these targets.
spell_apheliosw_summary: Aphelios swaps his main-hand gun with his off-hand gun, replacing his basic attack and activated ability.
spell_ashepassive_summary:
Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets.

Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.
spell_asheq_summary: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.
spell_ashespiritofthehawk_summary: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.
spell_aspectofthecougar_summary: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.
spell_auraofdespair_summary: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curses</font> refreshed.
spell_aurelionsole_summary: Aurelion Sol summons a black hole, damaging enemies and slowly pulling them toward its center.
