This ability grants Stardust each time an enemy dies within the black hole and for each second an enemy champion is caught inside it. The center of the black hole executes enemies who are below a certain percentage of their maximum health. Stardust increases Singularity's area as well as the execution threshold.
spell_aurelionsolpassive_summary: Aurelion Sol's damaging Abilities break down enemies into stacks of <font color='#3458eb'>Stardust</font>, which permanently improves each of his abilities.
spell_aurelionsolq_summary: Aurelion Sol channels his dragon breath for a few seconds, damaging the first enemy hit and splashing reduced damage onto nearby enemies. Each second the breath is channeled directly at an enemy will deal bonus damage, which is improved by the amount of Stardust that's been collected. This ability collects Stardust if the target is a champion.
spell_aurelionsolr_summary:
Falling Star: Aurelion Sol crashes a star into the earth. This impact deals magic damage and stuns enemies while also granting Stardust for each enemy champion it hits. Gathering enough Stardust transforms Aurelion Sol's next Falling Star into The Skies Descend.

The Skies Descend: Aurelion Sol drags a giant star down from the heavens with an increased impact zone and increased damage, knocking up enemies rather than stunning them. A shockwave then spreads from the edge of the impact zone, which damages and slows the enemies it hits. Stardust increases the impact area of both Falling Star and The Skies Descend.
spell_aurelionsolw_summary: Aurelion Sol flies over terrain in a targeted direction. While in this state, he can cast other abilities. Breath of Light no longer has a cooldown or maximum channel duration and deals increased damage while flying. Astral Flight's remaining cooldown is reduced whenever an enemy champion dies after being recently damaged by Aurelion Sol. Stardust increases Astral Flight's maximum range.
spell_aurora_e_summary: Aurora converges the realms, sending out a blast of spirit magic that damages and slows enemies before Aurora hops backward to safety.
spell_aurora_passive_summary: Aurora's spells and attacks exorcise spirits from the enemies she damages. Exorcised spirits follow Aurora around and heal her.
spell_aurora_q_summary: Aurora sends out a missile that curses any enemies it hits. She can then recast the ability to draw active curses back toward herself, damaging foes who are hit along the way.
spell_aurora_r_summary: Aurora leaps in a direction of her choosing, releasing a shockwave that damages and slows any enemies it hits. Afterward, she creates an area that slows enemies within it and allows Aurora to teleport from one side of the area to the other.
spell_aurora_w_summary: Aurora leaps in a direction of her choosing, entering the spirit realm upon landing, becoming invisible, and gaining Move Speed for a short duration of time.
spell_aurorae_summary: Aurora blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.
spell_auroraq_summary:
Aurora throws out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back.

When Aurora strikes 9 enemies with her abilities, Orb of Deception also heals her.
spell_aurorar_summary: Aurora dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging 3 nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions). Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.
spell_auroraw_summary: Aurora releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
spell_avatarsmite_shared_passive: <passive>Against Monsters and Minions:</passive> Your familiar deals <font color='#FEFCFF'>@f1@</font> true damage and half that damage to nearby monsters. Against monsters, additionally restores <font color='#FFFFFF'>@f6@</font> <font color='#FF6666'>(+@f7@)</font> Health.
spell_azirewrapper_summary: Azir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.
spell_azirpassive_summary: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.
spell_azirqwrapper_summary: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.
spell_azirr_summary: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
spell_azirw_summary: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line.
spell_bandagetoss_summary: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
spell_barde_summary: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.
spell_bardq_summary: Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both.
spell_bardr_summary: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.
spell_bardw_summary: Reveals a Health shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing and speeding up the first ally that touches it.
spell_belvethe_summary: Bel'Veth roots herself in place, channeling a storm of slashes around her that targets the lowest-health enemy and grants her lifesteal and damage reduction.
spell_belvethpassive_summary: Bel'Veth gains permanent attack speed stacks after taking down large minions and monsters and champions. She also gains temporary bonus attack speed after using an ability.
spell_belvethq_summary: Bel'Veth dashes in a chosen direction and damages all enemies she passes through.
spell_belvethr_summary: Bel'Veth consumes Void coral remnants, transforming into her true form and increasing her max health, attack range, attack speed, and out-of-combat move speed. Consuming the Void coral remnants of a Void epic monster will grant her a longer ultimate duration, as well as the power to summon Void remora.
spell_belvethw_summary: Bel'Veth slams her tail to the ground, damaging, knocking up, and slowing her enemies.
spell_blessingofthelizardelder_summary:
This unit recovers Health when not recently damaged by champions, turrets or epic monsters. Their basic attacks burn and slow the target over several seconds.

If the buff holder is slain, this buff is transferred to their killer.
spell_blindmonkeone_summary:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple.
Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Move Speed. Move Speed recovers gradually over the duration.
spell_blindmonkqone_summary:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage based on the target's missing Health.
spell_blindmonkrkick_summary: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.
spell_blindmonkwone_summary:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.
spell_brande_summary: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target that spreads to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration's spread is doubled.
spell_brandpassive_summary: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. If Brand kills an enemy while it is ablaze he regains mana. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion or large monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds, applying spell effects and dealing massive damage in an area around the victim.
spell_brandq_summary: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target.
spell_brandr_summary: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire that bounces up to 5 times off of Brand and nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to enemies each time bounce. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.
spell_brandw_summary: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.
spell_braume_summary: Braum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds, intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction.
spell_braumpassive_summary:
Braum's basic attacks apply Concussive Blows. Once the first stack is applied, ally basic attacks also stack Concussive Blows.

Upon reaching 4 stacks, the target is stunned and takes magic damage. For the next few seconds they cannot receive new stacks, but take bonus magic damage from Braum's attacks.
spell_braumq_summary:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.
spell_braumrwrapper_summary: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.
spell_braumw_summary: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.
spell_briare_summary: Briar refocuses her mind, removing Blood Frenzy and channeling energy into a powerful scream that damages and slows enemies. While charging, she takes reduced damage and heals for a portion of her max Health. A fully charged scream knocks foes back, dealing additional damage and stunning those who collide with a wall.
spell_briarp_summary: Briar's attacks and abilities apply a stacking bleed that heals her for a portion of the damage it deals. Perpetually hungry, she gains increased healing based on her missing Health, but lacks innate Health Regeneration.
spell_briarq_summary: Briar leaps to a unit and hits enemies with The Heel Wheel (of Pain), stunning them and breaking their Armor.
spell_briarr_summary: Briar kicks her pillory's hemolith gemstone, marking the first champion it hits as her prey. She then beelines straight to them, fearing other surrounding enemies upon arriving at her target, and enters a state of complete hemomania. She will pursue her prey until death, gaining the benefits of Blood Frenzy as well as additional Armor, Magic Resistance, Life Steal, and Move Speed.
spell_briarw_summary:
Briar leaps forward and shatters her pillory, entering a Blood Frenzy that causes her to relentlessly pursue the nearest enemy (prioritizing champions). While frenzied, she gains increased Attack Speed and Move Speed, and her attacks deal damage in an area around her target.

Briar can reactivate this ability while frenzied to take a CHOMP out of her target on her next attack, dealing additional damage based on their missing Health, and healing Briar based on the damage she deals.
spell_burningagony_summary: Dr. Mundo drains his Health to reduce the duration of disables and deal continual damage to nearby enemies.
spell_bushwhack_summary: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
spell_caitlynaceinthehole_summary: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
spell_caitlynentrapment_summary: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.
spell_caitlynp_summary: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.
spell_caitlynpiltoverpeacemaker_summary: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).
spell_caitlynyordletrap_summary: Caitlyn sets a trap that, when sprung, reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds, granting Caitlyn an empowered Headshot.
spell_camillee_summary: Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemy champions upon landing.
spell_camillepassive_summary: Basic attacks on champions grant a shield equal to a percentage of Camille's maximum health against their damage type (Physical or Magic) for a brief duration.
spell_camilleq_summary: Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus Move Speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks.
spell_camiller_summary: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.
spell_camillew_summary: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.
spell_cardmasterstack_summary: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.
spell_carpetbomb_summary: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.
spell_carpetbombmega_summary: Corki's Valkyrie is upgraded into Special Delivery. He flies a great distance, dropping bombs that knock aside enemies and create a trail of destruction that damage and slows opponents who remain in the fire.
spell_cassiopeiae_summary: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.
spell_cassiopeiaq_summary: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Move Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
spell_cassiopeiar_summary: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
spell_cassiopeiaw_summary: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.
spell_chronoshift_summary: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.
spell_consecration_self_summary: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.
spell_crystallize_summary: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.
spell_curseofthesadmummy_summary: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his <keywordMajor>Curse</keywordMajor>, damaging and stunning them.
spell_dariuse_summary: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.
spell_dariushemomarker_summary: Darius' attacks and damaging abilities cause enemies to bleed for physical damage over 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Darius enrages and gains massive Attack Damage when his target reaches max stacks.
spell_dariusq_summary: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions and large monsters hit by the blade.
spell_dariusr_summary: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.
spell_dariusw_summary: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Move Speed is slowed.
spell_deceive_summary:
Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.

His first attack while Invisible is empowered, dealing bonus damage and reducing Deceive's cooldown
spell_defensiveballcurl_summary: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, and returning damage to enemies that attack him.
spell_destiny_summary: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.
spell_dianaorbs_summary: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.
spell_dianapassive_summary: Every third strike cleaves nearby enemies for an additional magic damage. After casting a spell, Diana gains Attack Speed for 5 seconds.
spell_dianaq_summary:
Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing magic damage.

Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them if they are not stealthed for 3 seconds.
spell_dianar_summary:
Diana reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and slows them.

If Diana pulls in one or more enemy champions, the moonlight crashes down onto her after a short delay, dealing magic damage in an area around her, increased for each target beyond the first pulled.
spell_dianateleport_summary:
Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing magic damage.

Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush.
spell_dianavortex_summary:
Passive: Increases the attack speed gained from Moonsilver Blade

Active: Reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and then slows them for 2 seconds.
spell_dravendoubleshot_summary: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.
spell_dravenfury_summary: Draven gains increased Move Speed and Attack Speed. The Move Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.
spell_dravenpassive_summary: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.
spell_dravenrcast_summary: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction. Executes enemies who have less health than Draven's number of Adoration stacks.
spell_dravenspinning_summary: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.
spell_drmundoe_summary:
Passive - Dr. Mundo gains bonus Attack Damage, increasing based on his max Health.

Active - Dr. Mundo slams his medical bag into an enemy, dealing additional damage based on his missing Health. If the enemy dies they are swatted away, dealing damage to enemies they pass through.
spell_drmundopassive_summary:
Dr. Mundo resists the first Immobilizing effect that hits him, instead losing Health and dropping a chemical cannister nearby. Dr. Mundo can pick it up by walking over it, restoring Health and reducing this Ability's Cooldown.

Dr. Mundo also has significantly increased Health regeneration.
spell_drmundoq_summary: Dr. Mundo throws an infected bonesaw, dealing damage to the first enemy hit based on their current health and slowing them.
spell_drmundor_summary: Dr. Mundo pumps himself with chemicals, instantly healing a percent of his missing Health. He then gains Move Speed and regenerates a portion of his maximum Health over a long duration.
spell_drmundow_summary: Dr. Mundo electrocutes himself, dealing persistent damage to nearby enemies and storing a portion of damage he takes. At the end of the duration or on Recast, Dr. Mundo deals a burst of damage to nearby enemies. If the burst hit an enemy, he heals a percentage of the stored damage.
spell_ekkoe_summary: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.
spell_ekkopassive_summary: Every third attack or damaging spell on the same target deals bonus magic damage, and grants Ekko a burst of speed if the target is a champion.
spell_ekkoq_summary: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.
spell_ekkor_summary: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.
spell_ekkow_summary: Ekko's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage to low health enemies. He can cast Parallel Convergence to split the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and stuns enemies by suspending them in time.
spell_elderdragonbuff_summary: Damaging enemies causes them to burn with <trueDamage>true damage</trueDamage> for a few seconds. In addition, damaging an enemy champion at low health blasts them with Dragonfire, attempting to execute them.
spell_elisehumane_summary:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy. After descending on an enemy target, Elise's bonus damage and healing from Spider Queen is increased.
spell_elisehumanq_summary:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
spell_elisehumanw_summary:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
spell_elisepassive_summary:
Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.

Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.
spell_eliser_summary: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for Move Speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
spell_eliserspider_summary: Transforms into Human Form, removing Spider Form bonuses but granting the ability to generate new Spiderlings by casting spells.
spell_elisespidere_summary: Ascends into the air, briefly becoming untargetable, and then descends upon an enemy.
spell_elisespiderq_summary:
Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.

Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.
spell_elisespiderw_summary: Elise and her Spiderlings gain a burst of Attack Speed.
spell_enchantedcrystalarrow_summary: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.
spell_evelynne_summary: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains Move Speed for a short duration.
spell_evelynnpassive_summary: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.
spell_evelynnq_summary: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes a few times.
spell_evelynnr_summary: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.
spell_evelynnw_summary: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.
spell_eyeofthestorm_summary: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.
spell_ezreale_summary: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit. Prioritizes enemies stuck with Essence Flux.
spell_ezrealpassive_summary: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.
spell_ezrealq_summary: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns slightly if it strikes an enemy unit.
spell_ezrealr_summary: Ezreal winds up before firing a powerful barrage of energy that deals massive damage to each unit it passes through (damage is reduced for minions and non-epic monsters).
spell_ezrealw_summary: Ezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit. If Ezreal hits an enemy with the orb, it detonates and deals damage.
spell_feast_summary: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.
spell_feralscream_summary: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
spell_ferocioushowl_summary: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.
spell_fiddlestickse_summary: Fiddlesticks slashes an area with its scythe, slowing all enemies hit and silencing enemies hit in the center of the slash.
spell_fiddlestickspassive_summary: Fiddlesticks' trinket is replaced by scarecrow effigies.
spell_fiddlesticksq_summary: Fiddlesticks damaging enemies with spells while unseen or targeting an enemy with Terrify's activation strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.
spell_fiddlesticksr_summary: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.
spell_fiddlesticksw_summary: Fiddlesticks drains health from nearby enemies, dealing bonus execute damage at the end of the duration.
spell_fiorae_summary: Fiora has increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack slows the target, and the second attack will critically strike.
spell_fiorapassive_summary: Fiora has revealed a <keywordMajor>Vital</keywordMajor> on this Champion. If she hits the <keywordMajor>Vital</keywordMajor>, she <healing>restores Health</healing> and gains <speed>Move Speed</speed>.
spell_fioraq_summary: Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.
spell_fiorar_summary: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on an enemy champion and gains Move Speed while near them. If Fiora hits all four Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.
spell_fioraw_summary: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.
spell_fizze_summary: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.
spell_fizzpassive_summary: Fizz can move through units and takes a flat amount of reduced damage from all sources
spell_fizzq_summary: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.
spell_fizzr_summary: Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.
spell_fizzw_summary: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage and empower his further attacks for a short time.
spell_flashfrost_summary: Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.
spell_fling_summary: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
spell_forcepulse_summary: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.
spell_frostbite_summary: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing damage. If the target was recently hit by Flash Frost or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled.
spell_galioe_summary: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.
spell_galiopassive_summary: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area.
spell_galioq_summary: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado that deals damage over time.
spell_galior_summary: Galio designates an ally's position as his landing spot, granting all allies in the area a magic shield. After a delay Galio smashes down location, knocking up nearby enemies.
spell_galiow_summary: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt and damage nearby enemies.
spell_gangplanke_summary: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.
spell_gangplankpassive_summary: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.
spell_gangplankqwrapper_summary: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.
spell_gangplankr_summary: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
spell_gangplankw_summary: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.
spell_garene_summary: Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.
spell_garenpassive_summary: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second.
spell_garenq_summary: Garen gains a burst of Move Speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.
spell_garenr_summary: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion.
spell_garenw_summary: Garen passively increases his Armor and Magic Resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a shield and tenacity for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.
spell_ggun_summary: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.
spell_glacialstorm_summary: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.
spell_gnare_summary:
Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.
spell_gnarpassive_summary: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.
spell_gnarq_summary:
Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.
spell_gnarr_summary: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them.  Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.
spell_gnarw_summary:
Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Move Speed.

Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area.
spell_gragase_summary: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.
spell_gragaspassive_summary: Gragas periodically heals upon using a skill.
spell_gragasq_summary: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. The potency of the explosion increases over time. Enemies struck by the blast have their Move Speed slowed.
spell_gragasr_summary: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.
spell_gragasw_summary: Gragas samples his latest brew for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes boisterous and belligerent, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.
spell_graveschargeshot_summary: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.
spell_gravesmove_summary: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor and Magic Resist boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.
spell_gravespassive_summary: Graves' shotgun has some unique properties. He must reload when he runs out of ammo. Attacks fire 4 bullets, which cannot pass through units. Non-champions struck by multiple bullets are knocked back.
spell_gravesqlinespell_summary: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 1 second, or after colliding with terrain.
spell_gravessmokegrenade_summary: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke that reduces sight range. Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt magic damage and have their Move Speed reduced briefly.
spell_gwene_summary: Gwen dashes a short distance then gains Attack Speed, attack range, and magic damage <OnHit>On-Hit</OnHit> for a few seconds. If she hits an enemy during that time, this Ability's cooldown is partially refunded.
spell_gwenp_summary: Gwen's attacks deal bonus magic damage based on the targets health. She heals for a portion of the damage dealt to champions by this effect.
spell_gwenq_summary: Gwen snips her scissors in a cone up to 6 times dealing magic damage. Gwen deals true damage to units in the center and applies her passive to them on each snip.
spell_gwenr_summary:
Gwen hurls a needle that slows enemies hit, deals magic damage, and applies A Thousand Cuts to champions hit.

This ability can be cast up to two more times, with each cast throwing additional needles and dealing more damage.
spell_gwenw_summary: Gwen summons mist that protects her from enemies outside of it. She can only be targeted by enemies who enter the mist.
spell_hallucinatefull_summary: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets).  Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
spell_headbutt_summary: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.
spell_hecarimpassive_summary: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Move Speed.
spell_hecarimramp_summary: Hecarim gains increasing Move Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.
spell_hecarimrapidslash_summary: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage. If Hecarim damages at least one enemy, he increases the damage and lowers the cooldown of subsequent Rampages.
spell_hecarimult_summary: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.
spell_hecarimw_summary: Hecarim gains Armor and Magic Resist. Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies, and gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.
spell_heightenedlearning_summary: Zilean stores time as Experience and can grant it to his allies. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level up, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives.
spell_heimerdingere_summary: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.
spell_heimerdingerq_summary: Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).
spell_heimerdingerw_summary: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.
spell_highlander_summary: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Move Speed and Attack Speed as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.
spell_howlinggale_summary: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.
spell_hweie_summary:
Hwei envisions a series of torments, allowing him to paint controlling visages.

This ability replaces Hwei's abilities with crowd control abilities: Grim Visage, Gaze of the Abyss, and Crushing Maw.
spell_hweiee_summary: Hwei paints a set of jaws that bites down on enemies, dragging them to the center and slowing them.
spell_hweieq_summary: Hwei paints a terrifying face that damages the first enemy it hits and causes them to flee.
spell_hweiew_summary: Hwei paints an eye at the target location that grants vision and stares at the first enemy champion that enters its range. The eye then launches at them, rooting the first enemy hit.
spell_hweipassive_summary:
Hwei primes enemy champions he damages with his abilities for his signature finishing touch.

Hitting an enemy with a second damaging spell completes his signature, leaving it beneath them. The signature detonates after a short delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies in range.
spell_hweiq_summary:
Hwei envisions a series of disasters, allowing him to paint a devastating blow.

This ability replaces Hwei's abilities with damaging abilities: Devastating Fire, Severing Bolt, and Molten Fissure.
spell_hweiqe_summary: Hwei paints a field of volcanic eruptions that leaves lava in its path.
spell_hweiqq_extendedbelowline: <rules>Maximum <magicDamage>@spell.HweiQQ:MaxBonusDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage> bonus damage versus monsters.</rules>
spell_hweiqq_summary: Hwei paints a blazing fireball that explodes upon hitting an enemy unit or at the end of its path.
spell_hweiqw_summary: Hwei paints a long-distance, long wind-up lightning bolt that deals extra damage to immobilized or isolated targets at low health.
spell_hweir_summary: Hwei paints a vision of pure despair. The first enemy champion struck becomes the center of an expanding painting that slows and damages nearby enemies. The vision explodes after reaching its maximum size or when the champion dies.
spell_hweiw_summary:
Hwei envisions a series of serenities, allowing him to paint invigorating settings.

This ability replaces Hwei's abilities with utility abilities: Fleeting Current, Pool of Reflection, and Stirring Lights.
spell_hweiwashbrush_summary: Hwei clears his paintbrush and returns to base abilities without using mana or cooldowns. Only available while {{Spell_HweiQ_Name}}, {{Spell_HweiW_Name}}, or {{Spell_HweiE_Name}} are active.
spell_hweiwe_summary: Hwei paints three swirling lights that grant his next three spells or attacks bonus magic damage and mana restoration.
spell_hweiwq_summary: Hwei paints a current of swift waters in a line that grants movement speed to himself and allies.
spell_hweiww_summary: Hwei paints a protective pool at a location that grants shields to allies.
spell_illaoie_summary: Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a <font color='#669900'>Vessel</font> and begin spawning Tentacles.
spell_illaoipassive_summary: Illaoi and the <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font> she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font>, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.
spell_illaoiq_summary: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.
spell_illaoir_summary: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.
spell_illaoiw_summary: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.
spell_infectedcleavermissilecast_summary: Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing damage equal to a portion of his target's current Health and slowing them for a short time. Dr. Mundo delights in the suffering of others, so he is returned a portion of the Health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver (doubled on killing blows).
spell_insanitypotion_summary: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats, and making his Poison Trail apply Grievous Wounds.
spell_ireliae_summary: Irelia sends out two blades which converge on each other. Enemies caught in between are damaged, stunned and Marked.
spell_ireliapassive_summary: When Irelia strikes enemies with spells she gains stacking bonus Attack Speed. At maximum stacks she also gains bonus damage on hit.
spell_ireliaq_summary: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, healing herself. If the target is Marked or dies to Bladesurge, its cooldown refreshes.
spell_ireliar_summary: Irelia fires a massive number of blades that explode outward upon hitting an enemy champion. Enemies hit by the blades are damaged and Marked. Afterwards the blades form a wall that will damage and slow enemies that walk through it.
spell_ireliaw_summary: Irelia charges a strike that deals more damage as she charges. She takes reduced physical damage during the charge.
spell_iverne_summary: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies. The shield refreshes if it hits no enemies.
spell_ivernp_summary: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience.
spell_ivernq_summary: Ivern conjures a vine, dealing damage and rooting enemy targets hit. Ivern's allies can dash to the rooted target.
spell_ivernr_summary: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Re-cast command Daisy to attack or move.
spell_ivernw_summary: In brush, Ivern and his nearby allies attacks deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.
spell_jackinthebox_summary: Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies.
spell_jarvanivcataclysm_summary: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.
spell_jarvanivdemacianstandard_summary: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.
spell_jarvanivdragonstrike_summary: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
spell_jarvanivgoldenaegis_summary: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
spell_jarvanivmartialcadence_summary: Jarvan's first basic attack on an enemy deals bonus physical damage based on their current Health. This effect cannot occur again on the same enemy for a few seconds.
spell_javelintoss_summary: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.  As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.
spell_jaxcounterstrike_summary: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.
spell_jaxempowertwo_summary: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.
spell_jaxleapstrike_summary: Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.
spell_jaxrapexform_summary: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to deal damage around himself and strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.
spell_jaxrelentlessassault_summary: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to deal damage around himself and strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.
spell_jayceaccelerationgate_summary:
Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Move Speed of all allied champions who pass through it.
If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.
spell_jaycehypercharge_summary: Gains a burst of energy increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.
spell_jaycepassive_summary: When Jayce swaps weapons he gains Move Speed for a short duration.
spell_jayceshockblast_summary: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies in the area of the explosion.
spell_jaycestancegth_summary: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.
spell_jaycestancehtg_summary:
Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist.

Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.
spell_jaycestaticfield_summary:
Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds.

Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.
spell_jaycethunderingblow_summary:
Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance.

Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Move Speed of all allied champions who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.
spell_jaycetotheskies_summary:
Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies.

Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
spell_jhine_summary:
Jhin places an invisible lotus trap that blooms when walked over. It slows nearby enemies before dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals.

Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a lotus trap will bloom near their corpse.
spell_jhinq_summary: Jhin launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time it kills.
spell_jhinr_summary: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.
spell_jhinw_summary: Jhin brandishes his cane, firing a single shot with incredible range. It pierces through minions and monsters, but stops on the first champion hit. If the target was recently struck by Jhin's allies, lotus traps, or damaged by Jhin, they are rooted.
spell_jinxe_summary: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.
spell_jinxpassivemarker_summary: Jinx receives massively increased Move Speed and Attack Speed whenever she helps kill or destroy an enemy champions epic jungle monster, or structure.
spell_jinxq_summary: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, but drain Mana and attack slower.
spell_jinxr_summary: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.
spell_jinxw_summary: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.
spell_kaisae_summary:
Kai'Sa briefly increases her Move Speed, then increases her Attack Speed.

Living Weapon: Supercharge is upgraded to briefly grant Invisibility.
spell_kaisapassive_summary: Kai'Sa's basic attacks stack Plasma, dealing increasing bonus magic damage. Allies' immobilizing effects help stack Plasma. Additionally, Kai'Sa's item purchases upgrade her basic spells to have more powerful properties.
spell_kaisaq_summary:
Kai'Sa shoots a swarm of missiles that seek out nearby targets.

Living Weapon: Icathian Rain is upgraded to shoot more missiles.
spell_kaisar_summary: Kai'Sa dashes near an enemy champion.
spell_kaisaw_summary:
Kai'Sa shoots a long range missile, marking enemies with her passive.

Living Weapon: Void Seeker is upgraded to apply more passive marks and reduce cooldown on champion hit.
spell_kalistaexpungewrapper_summary: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.
spell_kalistamysticshot_summary: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
spell_kalistapassivebuff_summary: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.
spell_kalistarx_summary: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.
spell_kalistaw_summary:
Gain bonus damage when Kalista and her Oathsworn strike the same target.

Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.
spell_karmamantra_summary: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.
spell_karmaq_summary:
Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.
spell_karmasolkimshield_summary:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Move Speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.
spell_karmaspiritbind_summary:
Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.
spell_karthusdeathdefied_summary: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells.
spell_karthusdefile_summary: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.
spell_karthusfallenone_summary: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.
spell_karthuslaywastea1_summary: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Deals increased damage to isolated enemies.
spell_karthuswallofpain_summary: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Move Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.
spell_katarinaewrapper_summary: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.
spell_katarinapassive_summary:
Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged recently, her remaining ability cooldowns are dramatically reduced.

If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.
spell_katarinaq_summary: Katarina throws a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.
spell_katarinar_summary: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.
spell_katarinaw_summary: Katarina gains a burst of Move Speed, tossing a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> into the air directly above herself.
spell_kaylee_summary:
Passive: Kayle's celestial sword, Virtue, deals bonus magic damage to enemies she attacks.

Active: Kayle's next attack smites her target with celestial fire, dealing bonus damage proportionate to their missing health.
spell_kaylepassive_summary: Kayle's attacks are empowered by the heavens as she levels up and spends skill points. Her wings are lit aflame as she progressively gains Attack Speed, Move Speed, Attack Range, and waves of fire on her attacks.
spell_kayleq_summary: Kayle conjures a portal, summoning a celestial sword that pierces through enemies, slowing, damaging, and reducing the resistances of all hit.
spell_kayler_summary: Kayle makes an ally invulnerable and calls upon former Aspects of Justice to purify the area around her target with a holy rain of swords.
spell_kaylew_summary: Blessed by the divine, Kayle heals and grants Move Speed to herself and the nearest ally.
spell_kayn_r_main_0:
Passive: Champions damaged by Kayn are marked for 3.15 seconds.

Kayn infests a marked enemy, becoming Untargetable. After @InfestDuration@ seconds or after Recasting, Kayn bursts out, dealing @Damage@ physical damage to the enemy.

Shadow Assassin: Increases this Ability's range, the distance Kayn exits, and refreshes The Darkin Scythe's Cooldown on exit.

Darkin Slayer: Instead deals @SlayerDamage@ max Health physical damage and restores @HealValue@ Health (@SlayerHealPercent*100@% damage amount).
spell_kayn_r_main_1:
Passive: Champions damaged by Kayn are marked for 3.15 seconds.

Kayn infests a marked enemy, becoming Untargetable. After @InfestDuration@ seconds or after Recasting, Kayn bursts out, dealing @Damage@ physical damage to the enemy.

Shadow Assassin: Increases this Ability's range, the distance Kayn exits, and refreshes The Darkin Scythe's Cooldown on exit.
spell_kayn_r_main_2:
Passive: Champions damaged by Kayn are marked for 3.15 seconds.

Kayn infests a marked enemy, becoming Untargetable. After @InfestDuration@ seconds or after Recasting, Kayn bursts out, dealing @Damage@ physical damage to the enemy.

Darkin Slayer: Instead deals @SlayerDamage@ max Health physical damage and restores @HealValue@ Health (@SlayerHealPercent*100@% damage amount).
spell_kaynpassive_summary:
Kayn wields an ancient weapon and fights Rhaast, the darkin within it, for control. Either the Darkin will triumph, or Kayn will master Rhaast and become the Shadow Assassin.

Darkin: Heal for a percentage of spell damage dealt to champions.

Shadow Assassin: For the first few seconds in combat with enemy champions, deal bonus damage.
spell_kaynq_summary: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.
spell_kaynr_summary: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.
spell_kaynw_summary: Kayn damages and slows targets in a line.
spell_kennenbringthelight_summary: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.
spell_kennenlightningrush_summary: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units and apply a Mark of the Storm. Kennen gains Move Speed when entering this form, and attack speed when leaving it.
spell_kennenpassive_summary: Kennen stuns enemies he hits 3 times with his abilities.
spell_kennenshurikenhurlmissile1_summary: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.
spell_kennenshurikenstorm_summary: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.
spell_khazixe_summary: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Wings</font>, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.
spell_khazixpassive_summary:
Nearby enemies that are Isolated from their allies are marked. Kha'Zix's abilities have interactions with Isolated targets.

When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow them for a few seconds.
spell_khazixq_summary: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Reaper Claws</font>, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
spell_khazixr_summary: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisible</font>, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Move Speed. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Adaptive Cloaking</font>, Void Assault gains increased <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisibility</font> duration, and an additional use.
spell_khazixw_summary: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Spike Racks</font>, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets are slowed for extra.
spell_kindredewrapper_summary: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
spell_kindredpassivemanager_summary: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.
spell_kindredq_summary: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
spell_kindredr_summary: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.
spell_kindredw_summary: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.  Lamb passively gains stacks by moving and attacking. When fully charged, Lamb's next attack restores health.
spell_klede_summary: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.
spell_kledq_summary:
Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.

When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.
spell_kledr_summary: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.
spell_kledriderq_summary: Kled fires a gun blast, hurling him backward. Hitting enemy champions restores <font color='#eae57e'>courage</font>.
spell_kledw_summary: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.
spell_kogmawbioarcanebarrage_summary: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.
spell_kogmawicathiansurprise_summary: 4 seconds after dying, Kogmaw explodes, dealing true damage to surrounding enemies.
spell_kogmawlivingartillery_summary: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.
spell_kogmawq_summary: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.
spell_kogmawvoidooze_summary: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
spell_ksantee_summary:
K'Sante dashes and gains a shield. If targeting an ally, K'Sante dashes to the ally with increased range and both gain a shield.

When All Out, cooldown is reduced and speed is increased.
spell_ksantep_extend:
{{Spell_KSanteP_Tooltip}}

Damage against minions has a minimum cap of 15-100 (based on level).
Damage against monsters has a maximum cap of 20-105 (based on level).
spell_ksantep_summary:
K'Sante's Abilities mark targets to take more damage on his next Attack.

When All Out, K'Sante deals more damage with all Attacks and Abilities.
spell_ksanteq_summary:
K'Sante strikes, damaging and slowing enemies in a short line.

On hit, grants a stack of Ntofo Strikes. At 2 stacks, K'Sante fires a shockwave that pulls enemies in.

When All Out, cooldown is reduced.
spell_ksanter_summary: K'Sante knocks an enemy back, launching them through any wall in their path. Then, K'Sante goes All Out and dashes after them, gaining increased damage, healing, and transformed abilities at the cost of reduced defenses.
spell_ksantew_summary:
K'Sante charges up, taking reduced damage, then dashes, knocking back and stunning enemies.

When All Out, deals increased damage and no longer knocks back or stuns.
spell_landslide_summary: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.
spell_leblance_summary: LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc roots them and deals additional damage.
spell_leblancq_summary: LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing additional damage. If either part kills the target, Leblanc refunds the Mana cost and part of this spell's remaining Cooldown.
spell_leblancr_rq1base: Mimicked Sigil of Malice / Ethereal Chains Damage
spell_leblancr_summary: LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells.
spell_leblancw_summary: LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location.
spell_leesinpassive_summary: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain Attack Speed and return Energy.
spell_leonashieldofdaybreak_summary: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.
spell_leonasolarbarrier_summary: Leona raises her shield to gain Damage Reduction, Armor, and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.
spell_leonasolarflare_summary: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed.
spell_leonasunlightpassive_summary: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.
spell_leonazenithblade_summary: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.
spell_lilliae_summary: Lillia hurls a seed that damages and slows those it lands on. If it doesn't hit anything, it will continue rolling until it hits a wall or target.
spell_lilliap_summary: Hitting a champion or monster with a skill will deal additional max Health damage over time.
spell_lilliaq_summary: Passively, Lillia gains stacking Move Speed when hitting enemies with spells. She can activate this to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, dealing extra true damage on the edge.
spell_lilliar_summary: Lillia causes all enemies with Dream Dust on them to become Drowsy before falling asleep. Those enemies will take extra damage on being forcibly woken up.
spell_lilliaw_summary: Lillia deals damage in a nearby area, dealing heavy damage in the center.
spell_lissandrae_summary: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
spell_lissandrapassive_summary: When an enemy champion dies near Lissandra they become a Frozen Thrall. Frozen Thralls slow nearby enemies and then, after a delay, shatter from the intense cold, dealing magic damage to nearby targets.
spell_lissandraq_summary: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Move Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.
spell_lissandrar_summary: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Move Speed.
spell_lissandraw_summary: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.
spell_listtype_caitlynbonusheadshotdamag: Bonus Headshot Damage on Trapped Targets
spell_listtype_ivernrresistances: Daisy's Base Armor And Magic Resist
spell_listtype_jaycehammerpassiveresist: Hammer Passive: Bonus Armor and Magic Resist
spell_listtype_lulumovementandattackspee: Move Speed and Attack Speed Duration
spell_luciane_summary: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.
spell_lucianpassive_summary: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot. When Lucian is healed or shielded by an ally, or when a nearby enemy Champion is immobilized, his next 2 basic attacks will deal bonus magic damage.
spell_lucianq_summary: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.
spell_lucianr_summary: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.
spell_lucianw_summary: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking and briefly revealing enemies. Lucian gains Move Speed for attacking marked enemies.
spell_lulue_summary: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.
spell_lulupassive_summary: Pix fires magical bolts of energy whenever the champion he's following attacks another enemy unit. These bolts are homing, but can be intercepted by other units.
spell_luluq_summary: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that damages and heavily slows all enemies it hits.
spell_lulur_summary: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
spell_luluw_summary: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Move Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.
spell_luxe_summary: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.
spell_luxilluminationpassive_summary: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for a few seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.
spell_luxq_summary: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.
spell_luxr_summary: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
spell_luxw_summary: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.
spell_malzahare_summary:
Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions.

If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.
spell_malzaharpassive_summary: When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage.
spell_malzaharq_summary: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.
spell_malzaharr_summary: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.
spell_malzaharw_summary: Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.
spell_manabarriericon_summary: Blitzcrank gains a shield based on their mana when dropping to low health.
spell_maokaie_summary: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.
spell_maokaipassive_summary: Maokai's basic attack also heals him and deals additional damage on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.
spell_maokaiq_summary: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.
spell_maokair_summary: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.
spell_maokaiw_summary: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.
spell_masochism_summary: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage based on his missing health, and his next basic attack headbutts his target for additional damage. Passively increases magic resist whenever Dr. Mundo is dealt magic damage or pays a health cost.
spell_masteryipassive_summary: Every few consecutive basic attack, Master Yi strikes twice.
spell_meditate_summary: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.
spell_megaadhesive_summary: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.
spell_mele_summary: Mel fires a radiant orb forward, rooting those at its center while the area around it slows enemies and deals damage over time.
spell_melpassive_summary:
Whenever Mel uses an ability, she gains three bonus projectiles (up to nine maximum) on her next attack.

When Mel deals damage through an ability or attack, she applies Overwhelm, which can stack infinitely. If the enemy is hit by Mel with enough Overwhelm damage, the stacks are consumed to execute the target.
spell_melq_summary: Mel fires a barrage of projectiles that explode around a target location, dealing damage repeatedly to enemies within the area.
spell_melr_summary:
Mel strikes all enemies marked with Overwhelm regardless of their distance from her, dealing additional damage for each stack of Overwhelm.

Ranks of Golden Eclipse increase Overwhelm's damage.
spell_melw_summary: Mel forms a barrier around herself that reflects enemy projectiles back at the attacker, prevents her from taking damage, and grants her movement speed.
spell_milioe_summary: Milio learns an allied spell for a limited period of time.
spell_milioesinglebuff_summary: Milio tosses a shield to an ally, temporarily increasing their movement speed. This ability has 2 charges.
spell_miliokickballq_summary: Kick a ball that knocks back an enemy. The ball launches upward on hit and falls toward the enemy, damaging and slowing enemies in the area upon impact.
spell_miliopassive_summary: Milio's abilities enchant allies on touch, making their next damage deal a burst of extra damage and burn the target.
spell_milioq_summary: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Milio to heal his allies.
spell_milior_summary: Milio unleashes a wave of soothing flames that heal and remove crowd control effects from allies in range.
spell_miliow_summary: Create an empowering zone that heals allies and increases attack range to those inside. The zone follows the ally nearest to the cast point.
spell_miliowretarget_summary: Milio instructs his buff zone to follow a new target.
spell_missfortunee_summary: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.
spell_missfortunepassive_summary: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she basic attacks a new target.
spell_missfortuneq_summary: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.
spell_missfortuner_summary: Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike
spell_missfortunew_summary: Miss Fortune passively gains Move Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.
spell_missilebarrage_summary: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
spell_monkeykingdecoy_summary: Wukong becomes <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisible</font> and dashes in a direction, leaving behind a clone that will attack nearby enemies.
spell_monkeykingdoubleattack_summary: Wukong's next attack gains attack range, deals bonus damage, and reduces the target's armor for a few seconds.
spell_monkeykingnimbus_summary: Wukong dashes to a targeted enemy and sends out images to attack enemies near his target, dealing damage to each enemy struck.
spell_monkeykingpassive_summary: Wukong gains stacking armor and max health regeneration while fighting champions and monsters.
spell_monkeykingspintowin_summary:
Wukong's extends his staff and spins it around repeatedly, gaining Move Speed.

Enemies struck take damage and are knocked up.
spell_mordekaisere_summary: Mordekaiser pulls all enemies in an area.
spell_mordekaiserpassive_summary: Mordekaiser gains a powerful damage aura and Move Speed after landing 3 attacks or spells against champions or monsters.
spell_mordekaiserq_summary: Mordekaiser smashes the ground with his mace dealing damage to each enemy struck. Damage is increased when hitting a single enemy.
spell_mordekaiserr_summary: Mordekaiser drags his victim to a different dimension with him and steals a portion of their stats. If he kills them, he keeps the stats until the victim respawns.
spell_mordekaiserw_summary: Mordekaiser stores damage he deals and takes to create a shield. He may consume the shield to heal.
spell_morganae_summary: Morgana anoints an ally with a protective barrier of starfire, which absorbs magical damage and disabling effects until it is broken.
