spell_morganapassive_summary: Morgana drains spirit from her enemies, healing as she deals damage to champions, large minions, and medium and larger jungler monsters.
spell_morganaq_summary: Morgana binds an enemy in place with dark magic, forcing them to feel the pain they've caused and dealing magic damage.
spell_morganar_summary: Morgana unleashes the full force of her Celestial power as she unbinds her wings and hovers above the ground. She lashes chains of dark pain onto nearby enemy champions, gaining Move Speed. The chains slow and deal initial damage and, after a delay, stun those who are unable to break them.
spell_morganaw_summary: Morgana casts a cursed shadow on an area, damaging enemies who dare stand in her dark circle. They receive magic damage over time, which increases the lower health they are.
spell_naafirie_summary: Naafiri dashes and damages enemies in an area around her, recalling her packmates and fully healing them.
spell_naafirip_summary: Naafiri spawns packmates that attack the targets of her attacks and abilities.
spell_naafiriq_summary:
Naafiri hurls up to two daggers, each inflicting bleed, or each inflicting bonus damage if the target is already bleeding.

Packmates leap to attack the first champion or monster hit by this skill.
spell_naafirir_summary: Naafiri becomes Untargetable and empowers her pack, spawning additional packmates and gaining increased Move Speed and Attack Damage.
spell_naafiriw_summary: Naafiri and her packmates dash at a champion, dealing damage. Naafiri reveals nearby enemies if she scores a takedown and can recast this Ability once. The second cast grants a shield.
spell_namie_summary: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks and spells deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
spell_namipassive_summary: When Nami's Abilities hit allied champions they gain Move Speed for a short duration.
spell_namiq_summary: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
spell_namir_summary: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
spell_namiw_summary: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
spell_nasuse_summary: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.
spell_nasuspassive_summary: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.
spell_nasusq_summary: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.
spell_nasusr_summary: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.
spell_nasusw_summary: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Move Speed and Attack Speed over time.
spell_nautilusanchordrag_summary: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward.  Colliding with an enemy pulls them and Nautilus together, dealing magic damage.  Colliding with terrain pulls Nautilus towards it.
spell_nautilusgrandline_summary: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
spell_nautiluspassive_summary: Nautilus' first Attack against a target deals increased physical damage and roots them briefly.
spell_nautiluspiercinggaze_summary: Nautilus gains a temporary Shield.  While it persists, his Attacks deal damage over time to his target and surrounding enemies.
spell_nautilussplashzone_summary: Nautilus creates three exploding waves around himself. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.
spell_neekoe_summary: Neeko slings a tangle that damages and roots everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.
spell_neekopassive_summary: Neeko can look like an ally champion or as other units on the map. Receiving immobilizing crowd control, casting damaging spells, damaging enemy towers as a non-champion, or your disguise taking damage equal to its healthbar breaks the disguise.
spell_neekoq_extendedbelowline: <rules>Each bloom deals an additional <magicDamage>@MonsterBonus@ magic damage</magicDamage> to monsters.</rules>
spell_neekoq_summary: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.
spell_neekor_summary: After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air, knocking up all nearby enemies. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and stunned. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.
spell_neekow_summary: Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack, briefly increasing her move speed. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction and recast to change the direction of the clone.
spell_netherblade_summary: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.
spell_nexusblitz_sorakabote_summary: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.
spell_nexusblitz_sorakabotq_summary: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka Bot recovers Health.
spell_nexusblitz_sorakabotr_summary: Soraka Bot fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.
spell_nexusblitz_sorakabotw_summary: Soraka Bot heals another friendly champion.
spell_nilahe_summary: Nilah enthusiastically dashes toward her target, dealing damage to any enemies she passes through on the way.
spell_nilahpassive_summary: Nilah gains increased experience from last-hitting minions along with the ability to enhance and share nearby healing and shielding from her allies.
spell_nilahq_summary: With a snap of her whip-blade, Nilah damages any enemies she hits in a straight line in her chosen direction. This action extends her attack range for a short duration.
spell_nilahr_summary: Twirling her whip-blade in joyful exuberance, Nilah deals damage to enemies around her before pulling them closer with her weapon.
spell_nilahw_summary: Nilah envelops herself in mist, increasing her movement speed and allowing her to gracefully dodge all incoming attacks. Any allies she touches during the mist's duration will also gain this effect.
spell_nocturnee_summary: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and applying fear to the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.
spell_nocturnep_buffdescription: Nocturne's next attack will cleave through all nearby enemies and heal him for each one hit.
spell_nocturnep_summary:
Every few seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for bonus physical damage and heals himself.

Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown.
spell_nocturneq_summary: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Move Speed and Attack Damage.
spell_nocturner_summary: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.
spell_nocturnew_summary: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.
spell_nulllance_summary: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.
spell_nunue_summary: Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies.  When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball.
spell_nunupassive_summary: Nunu increases the attack speed and Move Speed of Willump and a nearby ally, and causes Willump's basic attacks to damage enemies around the target.
spell_nunuq_summary: Willump takes a bite out of a minion, monster, or enemy champion, dealing damage and healing himself.
spell_nunur_summary: Nunu & Willump create a powerful blizzard in an area that slows enemies and deals massive damage at the end.
spell_nunuw_summary: Willump creates a snowball that grows in size and speed as he rolls it.  The snowball damages and knocks up enemies.
spell_obduracy_summary: Malphite attacks with such force that it creates a sonic boom. For the next few seconds, his attacks create aftershocks in front of him.
spell_olafaxethrowcast_summary: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and reducing their Armor and Move Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reset.
spell_olaffrenziedstrikes_summary: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased and he gains a Shield.
spell_olafragnarok_summary: Olaf passively gains increased armor and magic resist. He can activate this ability to become immune to disables for as long as he keeps attacking.
spell_olafrecklessstrike_summary: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.
spell_orianadetonatecommand_summary: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the Ball after a short delay.
spell_orianadissonancecommand_summary: Orianna commands her Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.
spell_orianaizunacommand_summary: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.
spell_orianaredactcommand_summary: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, Shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.
spell_oriannap_summary: Orianna's Attacks deal additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna Attacks the same target.
spell_ornne_summary: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.
spell_ornnq_summary: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.
spell_ornnr_summary: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.
spell_ornnw_summary: Ornn advances, breathing fire. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.
spell_overdrive_summary: Blitzcrank super charges themself to get dramatically increased Move and Attack Speed. They are temporarily slowed after the effect ends.
spell_pantheone_summary: Pantheon sets his shield, becoming invulnerable to damage from the front and striking repeatedly with his spear.
spell_pantheonpassive_summary: Every few spells or attacks, Pantheon's next spell is empowered.
spell_pantheonqwrapper_summary: Pantheon either thrusts his spear or throws his spear in the chosen direction.
spell_pantheonrjump_summary: Pantheon composes himself and then leaps into the air, landing at a chosen location as a comet.
spell_pantheonw_summary: Pantheon dashes to a target, damaging and stunning them.
spell_phosphorusbomb_summary: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.
spell_pickacard_summary: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.
spell_poisontrail_summary: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
spell_poppye_summary: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.
spell_poppypassive_summary: Poppy throws her buckler that bounces off the target. Poppy can pick it up to gain a temporary shield.
spell_poppyq_summary: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.
spell_poppyr_summary: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.
spell_poppyw_summary: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to gain Move Speed and stop enemy dashes around her. If a dash is stopped, the enemy is slowed and grounded.
spell_pounce_summary: Nidalee jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
spell_powerball_summary: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
spell_powerfist_summary: Blitzcrank charges up their fist to make the next attack deal double damage and pop their target up in the air.
spell_primalsurge_summary: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
spell_pulverize_summary: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.
spell_puncturingtaunt_summary: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him.
spell_pykee_summary: Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemy champions along its path.
spell_pykeq_summary: Pyke either stabs an enemy in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.
spell_pyker_summary: Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists.
spell_pykew_summary: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant Move Speed that decays over time.
spell_qiyanae_autoaimsubstring: <rules>If <spellName>{{Spell_QiyanaQv2_Name}}</spellName> is cast while this Ability is targeting a champion, Qiyana will automatically aim it at her target.</rules>
spell_qiyanae_summary: Qiyana dashes to an enemy, damaging them.
spell_qiyanapassive_summary: Qiyana's first basic attack or ability against each enemy deals bonus damage.
spell_qiyanaq_summary: Qiyana swings her weapon, dealing damage with a bonus effect based on her element.
spell_qiyanar_summary: Qiyana sends out a shockwave that detonates whatever elements she hits with it, stunning and damaging nearby enemies.
spell_qiyanaw_summary: Qiyana dashes to a location and enchants her weapon with an element. Her attacks and abilities deal bonus damage while her weapon is enchanted.
spell_quinne_summary: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Move Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target.
spell_quinnpassive_summary: Valor, Quinn's Demacian eagle, periodically marks enemies as <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font>. Quinn's first basic attack against <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> targets will deal bonus physical damage.
spell_quinnq_summary: Quinn calls Valor to mark an enemy and hinder its vision before damaging all enemies in the immediate area.
spell_quinnr_summary: Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed.  Ending the ability casts Skystrike, which deals damage to nearby enemies and marks champions as Vulnerable.
spell_quinnw_summary: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Move Speed after she attacks a <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.
spell_rakane_summary: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.
spell_rakanq_summary: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.
spell_rakanr_summary: Gains Move Speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.
spell_rakanw_summary: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.
spell_rammusp_summary: Rammus gains bonus Attack Damage scaling with his Armor and Magic Resistance.
spell_rapidreload_summary: A percentage of Corki's basic attack damage is dealt as bonus <trueDamage>true damage</trueDamage>.
spell_reapthewhirlwind_summary: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.
spell_rebirthmarker_summary: Upon taking fatal damage, Anivia reverts to an egg and is reborn with full health.
spell_reksaie_summary:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing physical damage, or bonus true damage if she has max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
spell_reksaipassive_summary: Rek'Sai generates Fury by Attacking and hitting with basic Abilities. She consumes this Fury while Burrowed to restore health.
spell_reksaiq_summary:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that damages and reveals enemies hit.
spell_reksairwrapper_summary: Rek'Sai passively marks targets by damaging them. She can activate this ability to become briefly untargetable and lunge at a marked target for heavy damage based on their maximum health.
spell_reksaiw_summary:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Move Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Unburrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
spell_relle_empoweredattack_description: This unit's next attack is empowered and will explode to nearby enemies.
spell_relle_summary:
Passive: Rell gains out of combat Move Speed.

Active: Rell and an ally gain ramping Move Speed, doubled toward enemies and each other. Her next Attack explodes, dealing magic damage.
spell_rellp_summary: Rell's Attacks and Abilities deal additional magic damage and steal Armor and Magic Resist on hit.
spell_rellq_stunbuff_description: This unit is stunned and is unable to move or act.
spell_rellq_summary: Rell deals magic damage to units in a line, breaking their shields and stunning them.
spell_rellr_summary: Rell explodes in a magnetic fury, violently Pulling nearby enemies toward herself. Then Rell constantly Drags nearby enemies toward herself for a short while, dealing magic damage over time.
spell_rellw_dismount_summary:
Mounted: Rell Dismounts, crashing down in her armor, Knocking enemies up and gaining a large Shield. While dismounted, she gains Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Speed, and Attack Range, but is Slowed.

Dismounted: Rell forms her Mount, gaining a burst of speed and Knocking Up the next enemy she attacks.
spell_rellw_mountup_summary:
Rell changes form, casting a different spell based on form.

Mounted: Rell Dismounts, crashed down in her armor, knocking enemies up and gaining a large shield. While dismounted, she gains Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Speed, and Attack Range, but is slowed.

Dismounted: Rell forms her mount, gaining a burst of speed and flipping the next enemy she attacks.
spell_renatae_summary: Renata sends out a pair of chemtech missiles, shielding allies and damaging and slowing enemies hit.
spell_renatapassive_summary: Renata's Attacks deal bonus damage and mark enemies. Renata's allies can damage marked enemies to deal bonus damage.
spell_renataq_summary: Renata sends out a missile rooting the first enemy hit, and can recast the ability to throw the unit in a direction.
spell_renatar_summary: Renata sends out a wave of chemicals, causing any enemies hit to go Berserk.
spell_renataw_summary: Renata buffs an allied champion to fight harder, delaying their death and potentially saving them if they get a takedown.
spell_renektoncleave_summary: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
spell_renektonpredator_summary: Renekton's attacks generate Fury, increased when he is low on life. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects.
spell_renektonpreexecute_summary: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, destroying damage shields on the target, dealing high physical damage, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.
spell_renektonreignofthetyrant_summary: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
spell_renektonsliceanddice_summary: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
spell_rengare_summary:
Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.

Ferocity effect: roots the target.
spell_rengarpassive_summary:
While in Brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack.

Rengar generates Ferocity whenever he casts an ability. At Max Ferocity, his next ability is empowered.

Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, granting bonus attack damage.
spell_rengarq_summary:
Rengar's next Attack brutally stabs his target for bonus damage.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage and grants Attack Speed.
spell_rengarr_summary: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, <font color='#cd90ee'>Camouflaging</font> him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Move Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy without being in brush, reducing their armor.
spell_rengarw_summary:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken.

Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.
spell_riftwalk_summary: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.
spell_rivenfeint_summary: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.
spell_rivenfengshuiengine_summary: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.
spell_rivenmartyr_summary: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.
spell_rivenpassive_summary: Riven's abilities charge her blade, and her basic attacks expend charges to deal an additional damage.
spell_riventricleave_summary: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
spell_rocketgrab_summary: Blitzcrank fires their right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to them.
spell_rumblecarpetbomb_summary: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
spell_rumbleflamethrower_summary: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
spell_rumblegrenade_summary: Rumble launches a harpoon, electrocuting his target with magic damage, slowing their Move Speed, and reducing their Magic Resist. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
spell_rumbleheatsystem_summary: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, gaining bonus Attack Speed and granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.
spell_rumbleshield_summary: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
spell_rupture_summary: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
spell_ryzee_summary: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that damages an enemy and debuffs all nearby enemies. Ryze's spells have additional effects against the debuffed enemy.
spell_ryzeqwrapper_summary:
Passively, Ryze's other basic abilities reset the cooldown of Overload and charge a rune. When Ryze casts Overload with 2 runes charged, he gains a brief burst of Move Speed.

On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If the target has Flux on it, Overload deals extra damage and bounces to nearby enemies with Flux.
spell_ryzer_summary:
Passively, Overload deals even more damage against targets with Flux.

On cast, Ryze creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.
spell_ryzew_summary: Ryze traps a target in a cage of runes, damaging them and slowing their movement. If the target has Flux on it, they are instead rooted.
spell_sadism_summary: Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Move Speed and drastically increased Health Regeneration.
spell_samirae_summary: Samira dashes through an enemy (including structures), slashing enemies she passes through and gaining Attack Speed. Killing an enemy champion refreshes this ability's cooldown.
spell_samirapassive_summary: Samira builds a combo by hitting attacks or abilities unique from the previous hit. Samira's attacks in melee range deal additional magic damage. Samira's attacks against enemies affected by <status>Immobilizing</status> effects will dash her to her attack range. If the enemy is <status>Knocked Up</status>, she also keeps them <status>Knocked Up</status> briefly.
spell_samiraq_summary: Samira fires a shot or swings her sword, dealing damage. If cast during Wild Rush, strike all enemies in her path upon completion.
spell_samirar_summary: Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons, wildly shooting all enemies surrounding her.
spell_samiraw_summary: Samira slashes around her, damaging enemies and destroying enemy missiles.
spell_secondsight_summary: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving 1 to 6 bonus gold.
spell_secondsight_summary_2: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving 1 to 6 bonus gold.
spell_seismicshard_summary: Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Move Speed for 3 seconds.
spell_sejuanie_summary: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
spell_sejuanipassive_summary: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage.  Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.
spell_sejuaniq_summary: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
spell_sejuanir_summary: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
spell_sejuaniw_summary: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage, slowing enemies and applying Frost stacks.
spell_sennae_summary: Senna draws the Mist she has stored in her weapon into a storm around her, embracing darkness and becoming a wraith within. Allies who enter the area are camouflaged and also appear as wraiths as the Mist shrouds them. Wraiths gain increased Move Speed, are unselectable, and hide their identities.
spell_sennapassive_summary:
When units die near Senna, their souls are periodically trapped by the Black Mist. Senna can attack these souls to free them, absorbing the Mist that held them in death. Mist fuels her Relic Cannon's power with increased Attack Damage, Attack Range, and Critical Strike Chance.

Attacks from Senna's Relic Cannon take longer to fire, deal bonus damage, and briefly grant her a portion of her target's Move Speed.
spell_sennaq_summary: From the twin barrels of her Relic Cannon, Senna fires a unified beam of light and shadow through a target, healing allies and damaging enemies.
spell_sennar_summary: Senna calls upon the relic stones of fallen Sentinels, splitting her relic cannon into a holy array of shadow and light. She then fires a global beam that shields allies from harm, while damaging enemies caught in the center.
spell_sennaw_summary: Senna sends forth a wave of Black Mist. If it hits an enemy it latches onto them hungrily, rooting them and everything nearby after a brief delay.
spell_seraphinee_summary: Seraphine deals damage and impairs the movement of enemies in a line.
spell_seraphinepassive_summary: Every third basic spell will cast twice from Seraphine. Additionally, casting spells near allies grants her bonus magic damage and range on her next basic attack.
spell_seraphineq_summary: Seraphine deals damage in an area.
spell_seraphiner_summary: Seraphine deals damage and charms enemies hit, refreshing the range with every allied or enemy champion hit.
spell_seraphinew_summary: Seraphine Shields and Hastes nearby allies. If she is already Shielded she will Heal nearby allies as well.
spell_sette_summary: Sett pulls in all enemies on opposite sides of him, dealing damage and stunning them. If enemies were only on one side, they are slowed instead of stunned.
spell_settpassive_summary: Sett's basic attacks alternate between left and right punch. Right punch is slightly stronger and faster. Sett also hates losing, gaining additional health regeneration based off of his missing health.
spell_settq_summary: Sett's next two attacks deal additional damage based off of the target's max health. Sett also gains Move Speed while moving towards enemy champions.
spell_settr_summary: Sett carries an enemy champion through the air and slams them into the ground, dealing damage and slowing all enemies near where they land.
spell_settw_summary: Sett passively stores damage he takes as Grit. On cast, Sett expends all stored Grit to gain a shield and punch an area, dealing true damage in the center and physical damage on the sides.
spell_shacopassive_summary: Shaco's basic attacks and Two-Shiv Poison deal additional damage when striking from behind.
spell_shacoq_summary:
Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.

His first attack while Invisible is empowered, dealing bonus damage and critically striking if he attacks from behind.
spell_shene_summary: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.
spell_shenpassive_summary: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.
spell_shenq_summary: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.
spell_shenr_summary: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.
spell_shenw_summary: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.
spell_shyvanadoubleattack_summary:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack and grants herself Attack Speed for her next attacks. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front of Shyvana.
spell_shyvanafireball_summary:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.
spell_shyvanaimmolationaura_summary:
Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Move Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.
spell_shyvanapassive_summary: Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.
spell_shyvanapassiveha_summary: Shyvana gains permanent stacking Armor and Magic Resistance whenever she or her allies kill siege minions or super minions. She also gains a stack whenever a Health Relic AOE heals her on the enemy mapside.
spell_shyvanapassivenb_summary: Shyvana gains permanent stacking Armor and Magic Resistance whenever she or her allies kill nearby epic monsters, buff monsters, and scuttlecrabs.
spell_shyvanatransformcast_summary:
Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.
spell_singedp_summary: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of Move Speed when passing them.
spell_sione_summary: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging, slowing, and reducing the Armor of all enemies that it passes through.
spell_sionpassive_summary: After being killed, Sion will temporarily reanimate with rapidly decaying Health. His attacks become very rapid, heal him, and deal bonus damage based on his target's maximum Health.
spell_sionq_summary: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.
spell_sionr_summary: Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged.
spell_sionw_summary: Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health.
spell_sivire_summary: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives health and a burst of movement speed if a spell is blocked.
spell_sivirpassive_summary: Sivir gains a short burst of Move Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.
spell_sivirq_summary: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.
spell_sivirr_summary: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge of Move Speed for a period of time. In addition, Sivir's attacks reduce her spell cooldowns.
spell_sivirw_summary: Sivir's next few basic attacks gain additional attack speed and bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage while bouncing.
spell_skarner_e_summary: Skarner charges forward and passes through terrain. If he collides with a champion or large monster, he'll slam them into the next wall he hits to damage and stun them.
spell_skarner_passive_summary: Skarner's Attacks, Shattered Earth, Upheaval, and Impale, apply Quaking. At max stacks of Quaking, enemies take max Health magic damage over its duration.
spell_skarner_q_summary: Skarner rips a boulder from the earth that empowers his attacks and can be thrown as a powerful projectile.
spell_skarner_r_summary: Skarner's tails lash forward to suppress enemy champions. Once suppressed, the victims will be dragged along by Skarner as he moves around.
spell_skarner_w_summary: Skarner gains a shield and creates an earthquake whose shockwave damages and slows foes.
spell_smoldere_summary: Smolder takes flight, gaining Move Speed, ignoring terrain, and attacking the lowest Health enemy.\n
spell_smolderq_summary:
Smolder belches flame, dealing @TotalDamage@ physical damage, or @TotalCritDamage@ physical damage if he critically strikes.

This Ability has an additional effect based on the Elemental Rift:
Infernal = Enemies hit take an additional @InfernalDoTDamage@ physical damage over @InfernalDoTDuration@ seconds.
Mountain = Baby Dragon gains @MountainShield@ Shield on cast.
Cloud = Baby Dragon is pushed back on cast.
Ocean = Allies hit restore @OceanHealPercent@% damage done Health.
Hextech = Enemies hit are Slowed by @HextechSlow@ for @HextechSlowDuration@ seconds.
Chemtech =
spell_smolderr_summary: Smolder calls his mom to breath fire from above, dealing extra damage and slowing enemies in the center of her fire.
spell_smolderw_btl:
Each consecutive explosion does @ExplosionDamageMultihitPenalty*100@% damage.
Smolder can only gain one Dragon Practice stack per champion hit.
spell_sonae_summary: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Move Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Move Speed.
spell_sonapassive_summary:
Accelerando: Sona gains non-Ultimate ability haste permanently for her basic abilities as she uses her abilities well, up to a cap. Beyond that cap, further successful uses reduce her ultimate's remaining cooldown instead.

Power Chord: Every few spell casts, Sona's next attack will deal bonus magic damage in addition to an additional effect based on what basic Ability Sona last activated.
spell_sonaq_summary: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.
spell_sonar_summary: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them.
spell_sonaw_summary: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.
spell_sorakae_summary: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.
spell_sorakaq_summary: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers Health.
spell_sorakar_summary: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all allied champions.
spell_sorakaw_summary: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.
spell_sowthewind_summary: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Move Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Move Speed.
spell_srx_dragonsoulbuffinfernal: On a cooldown, your next damaging spell or attack triggers a burst of flames around the target. Enemies struck are damaged.
spell_staticfield_summary: Enemies attacked by Blitzcrank are marked and take lightning damage after 1 second. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to remove nearby enemies' shields, damage them, and silence them briefly.
spell_summonerboost_summary: Removes all disables (excluding suppression and airborne) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and gives Tenacity.
spell_summonerdot_summary: Deals true damage over time to target enemy champion and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.
spell_summonerexhaust_summary: Slows target enemy champion and reduces their damage dealt.
spell_summonerflash_summary: Teleports you a short distance toward your cursor.
spell_summonerhaste_summary: Gain Move Speed and ignore unit collision for the duration.
spell_summonerheal_summary: Restores Health and grants Move Speed to you and target allied champion.
spell_summonermana_summary: Restores your and ally champion's Mana.
spell_summonersmite_summary: Deals true damage to a monster or minion.
spell_summonersmiteavatardefensive:
Your Mosstomper damages monsters in an area, a minion, or a champion.

Monsters and Minions: Deal @spell.SummonerSmite:Smite2ndUpgradedDamage@ true damage to monsters in the area or a single lane minion.

Champion or Pet: Deal @spell.SummonerSmite:SecondPVPDamage@ true damage and Slow by @spell.SummonerSmite:SmiteSlowAmount*100@% for @spell.SummonerSmite:SmiteSlowDuration@ seconds.

Passive: Killing large/epic monsters grants a permanent @item.1103:MaxShield@ health shield. The shield also regenerates after @item.1103:AvatarDamageCD@ seconds out of combat.

{{Spell_Smite_Shared_Rules}}
spell_summonersmiteavatardefensive_summa:
{{Spell_AvatarSmite_Shared_Passive}}

Against Champions: Deal @ChampionDamage@ true damage. Slow the target by @spell.SummonerSmite:SmiteSlowAmount*100@%.
spell_summonersmiteavataroffensive:
Your Scorchclaw damages monsters in an area, a minion, or a champion.

Monsters and Minions: Deal @spell.SummonerSmite:Smite2ndUpgradedDamage@ true damage to monsters in the area or a single lane minion.

Champion or Pet: Deal @spell.SummonerSmite:SecondPVPDamage@ true damage and Slow by @spell.SummonerSmite:SmiteSlowAmount*100@% for @spell.SummonerSmite:SmiteSlowDuration@ seconds.

Passive: Collect Ember stacks over time or killing large or epic monsters (up to @item.1101:AvatarMaxStacks@). Damaging a champion with @item.1101:AvatarMaxStacks@ Ember stacks Slows enemies by @item.1101:AvatarSlowAmount*100@% decaying over @item.1101:AvatarSlowDuration@ seconds and burns them for @item.1101:AvatarMaxHPBurnTotal*100@% max health over @item.1101:AvatarBurnDuration@ seconds.

{{Spell_Smite_Shared_Rules}}
spell_summonersmiteavataroffensive_summa:
{{Spell_AvatarSmite_Shared_Passive}}

Against Champions: Deal @ChampionDamage@ true damage. Slow the target by @spell.SummonerSmite:SmiteSlowAmount*100@%.
spell_summonersmiteavatarutility:
Your Gustwalker damages monsters in an area, a minion, or a champion.

Monsters and Minions: Deal @spell.SummonerSmite:Smite2ndUpgradedDamage@ true damage to monsters in the area or a single lane minion.

Champion or Pet: Deal @spell.SummonerSmite:SecondPVPDamage@ true damage and Slow by @spell.SummonerSmite:SmiteSlowAmount*100@% for @spell.SummonerSmite:SmiteSlowDuration@ seconds.

Passive: Gain @item.1102:AvatarCampMoveSpeed*100@% Move Speed, decaying over @item.1102:CampMSDuration@ seconds upon entering brush, increased to @item.1102:AvatarEnhancedCampMS*100@% when killing large Monsters.

{{Spell_Smite_Shared_Rules}}
spell_summonersmiteavatarutility_summary:
{{Spell_AvatarSmite_Shared_Passive}}

Against Champions: Deal @ChampionDamage@ true damage. Slow the target by @spell.SummonerSmite:SmiteSlowAmount*100@%.
spell_summonersmiteduel_summary: Deals 900 true damage to target epic, large, or medium monster or @MinionDamageFlat@ +@MinionDamagePercentHealth*100@% max health to minion. Restores Health based on your maximum life when used against monsters. Against champions, marks them to deal additional damage on each damaging Ability or Attack against them and reduce your damage taken from them.
spell_summonersmiteplayerganker_summary: Deals 900 true damage to target epic, large, or medium monster or @MinionDamageFlat@ +@MinionDamagePercentHealth*100@% max health to minion. Restores Health based on your maximum life when used against monsters. Against champions, deals damage, slows them, and grants you move speed for a duration.
spell_summonersnowball_summary: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.
spell_summonerteleport_summary: After a brief channel, become untargetable and travel to an allied unit. Upgrades into Unleashed Teleport, which significantly increases travel speed.
spell_summonerwolfwardsmite_summary:
{{Spell_AvatarSmite_Shared_Passive}}

Against Champions: Deal @spell.SummonerWolfwardSmite:ChampionDamage@ true damage. Slow the target by @spell.SummonerSmite:SmiteSlowAmount*100@%.
spell_swaine_summary: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits. Swain can then choose to pull all rooted champions closer. This ability has a shorter cooldown during Demonic Ascension.
spell_swainq_summary: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through enemies. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.
spell_swainr_summary: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from nearby enemy champions, minions, and neutral monsters. Swain can cast Demonflare to decimate and slow nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire. This form is indefinite as long as Swain drains enemy champions.
spell_swainw_summary: Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment.
spell_swipe_summary: Nidalee claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
spell_sylase_summary: Sylas dashes to a location. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits.
spell_sylaspassive_summary: After casting a spell, Sylas stores a charge of Petricite Burst. Sylas's basic attacks will expend a charge and whirl his energized chains around him dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit. While Sylas has a charge of Petricite Burst, he gains attack speed.
spell_sylasq_summary:
Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies.

After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage.
spell_sylasr_summary: Sylas steals the enemy's ultimate ability and can cast it freely.
spell_sylasw_summary: Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing damage and healing himself against enemy champions.
spell_syndrae_summary: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.
spell_syndrapassive_summary:
Syndra collects Splinters of Wrath from gaining levels and damaging enemies which upgrade her abilities.

Dark Sphere: Syndra can hold an additional charge
Force of Will: Bonus true damage.
Scatter the Weak: Increased width and slows all targets
Unleashed Power: Executes low health targets
spell_syndraq_summary: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.
spell_syndrar_summary: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.
spell_syndraw_summary: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Move Speed of enemies.
spell_tahmkenche_summary:
Passive: Tahm Kench stores a percent of the damage he takes and heals based on it while out of combat.

Active: Convert all stored damage into a temporary shield.
spell_tahmkenchnewr_summary: Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.
spell_tahmkenchpassive_summary: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of <spellName>An Acquired Taste</spellName>. At three stacks, he can use <spellName>Devour</spellName> on an enemy champion.
spell_tahmkenchq_summary:
Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit and healing himself if he strikes an enemy champion.

Applies a stack of An Acquired Taste to enemy champions. If the champion already has 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste, they are stunned and the stacks are consumed.
spell_tahmkenchr2_summary: Tahm Kench spits out his Devoured target.
spell_tahmkenchr_summary: Tahm Kench devours a champion for a few seconds, dealing magic damage if they are an enemy, or shielding them if they are an ally.
spell_tahmkenchw_summary: Dive down and then re-appear at target location, damaging and knocking up all enemies in an area.
spell_tailwindself_summary:
Janna's allies gain Move Speed moving towards her.

Janna deals a portion of bonus Move Speed as bonus magic damage on hit and with Zephyr.
spell_takedown_summary: Nidalee executes a powerful attack that deals increased damage to low Health and Hunted targets.
spell_taliyahe_summary: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield. If enemies dash through it or are knocked through it, the mines explode and stun them.
spell_taliyahq_summary: Taliyah throws a volley of rocks in a target direction, moving freely as she casts. This creates Worked Ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on Worked Ground, she consumes the ground to throw a stronger boulder that slows enemies.
spell_taliyahr_summary: Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
spell_taliyahwvc_summary: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within it in a direction of her choosing.
spell_talone_summary: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.
spell_talonpassive_summary: Talon's spells Wound champions and large monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.
spell_talonq_summary: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.
spell_talonr_summary: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Move Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.
spell_talonw_summary: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.
spell_tantrum_summary: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced.
spell_tarice_summary: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.
spell_taricpassive_summary: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.
spell_taricq_summary: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.
spell_taricr_summary: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.
spell_taricw_summary:
Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.

Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.
spell_teemoe_summary: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.
spell_teemoq_summary: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.
spell_teemor_summary: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.
spell_teemow_summary: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Move Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Move Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.
spell_threshe_summary: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
spell_threshpassivesouls_summary: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.
spell_threshq_summary: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
spell_threshrpenta_summary: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
spell_threshw_summary: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
spell_timewarp_summary: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Move Speed or increasing an ally's Move Speed for a short time.
spell_tremors2_summary: Rammus hops into the air and slams down at a target area, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If cast while Rammus is in Powerball, Rammus knocks up enemies near the center as well.
spell_tristanae_summary: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
spell_tristanapassive_summary: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.
spell_tristanaq_summary: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.
spell_tristanar_summary: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.
spell_tristanaw_summary: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.
spell_trundlecircle_summary: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.
spell_trundledesecrate_summary: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Move Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.
spell_trundlediseaseoverseer_summary: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.
spell_trundlepain_summary: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.
spell_trundletrollsmash_summary: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.
spell_tryndameree_summary: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
spell_tryndamereq_summary: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.
spell_tryndamerew_summary: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Move Speed reduced.
spell_twitchdeadlyvenommarker_summary: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.
spell_twitchexpunge_summary: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.
spell_twitchfullautomatic_summary: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.
spell_twitchhideinshadows_summary:
Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Move Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.

When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.
spell_twitchvenomcask_summary: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.
spell_twoshivpoison_summary: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their Move Speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage if the target is below 30% health.
spell_udyrbearstance_summary: Udyr gains movement speed and his first attack against each target will Stun them. Recast: Gain even more movement speed and immunity to immobilizing effects for a couple seconds.
spell_udyrpassivemonkeyagility_summary: Udyr has four basic Abilities that swap between Stances and can Recast an Ability to renew it with Ultimate benefits. Additionally, after using an Ability, Udyr's next two Attacks gain Attack Speed.
spell_udyrphoenixstance_summary: Udyr surrounds himself in a glacial storm, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Recast: Empower and unleash the storm, causing it to track enemies and deal additional damage.
spell_udyrtigerstance_summary: Udyr gains attack speed and his next two attacks deal bonus physical damage. Recast: Gain even more attack speed, and the next two attacks call lightning to strike the target.
spell_udyrturtlestance_summary: Udyr gains a shield and his next two attacks heal him. Recast: Gain an even bigger shield and heal based on max health over the next couple seconds.
spell_ufslash_summary: Malphite launches himself to a location at high speed, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.
spell_undyingrage_summary: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.
spell_upgradedsmite_shared_passive: <passive>Against Monsters:</passive> Your familiar deals <trueDamage>@spell.SummonerSmite:SmiteUpgradedDamage@ true damage</trueDamage>.
spell_urgote_summary: Urgot charges in a direction, shielding himself and trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way.
spell_urgotpassive_summary: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.
spell_urgotq_summary: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.
spell_urgotr_summary: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.
spell_urgotw_summary: Urgot slows himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.
spell_varuse_summary: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Move Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.
spell_varuspassivebuff_summary: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Damage and Ability Power. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.
spell_varusq_summary: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.
spell_varusr_summary: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.
spell_varusw_summary: Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health. Active: Varus empowers his next Piercing Arrow.
spell_vaynee_summary: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
spell_vayneq_summary: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.
spell_vayner_summary: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, reduced Tumble cooldown, and more bonus Move Speed from Night Hunter
spell_vaynew_summary: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's max health as bonus true damage.
spell_veigarbalefulstrike_summary: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.
spell_veigardarkmatter_summary: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.
spell_veigareventhorizon_summary: Veigar twists the edges of space, creating a cage that Stuns enemies that pass through.
spell_veigarpassive_summary: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.
spell_veigarr_summary: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.
spell_velkoze_summary: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
spell_velkozpassive_summary: Vel'Koz's abilities apply <keywordName>Organic Deconstruction</keywordName> to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.
spell_velkozq_summary: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
spell_velkozr_summary: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.
spell_velkozw_summary: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
spell_vexe_summary: Summon a damaging and slowing zone that applies Gloom to enemies.
spell_vexp_summary: Vex periodically becomes empowered, causing her next basic Ability to fear enemies and interrupt dashes. Whenever a nearby enemy dashes, Vex applies a mark that can be consumed for bonus damage that also reduces the cooldown of her empowered state.
spell_vexq_summary: Launch a damaging missile that accelerates mid-flight.
spell_vexr_summary: Fire a missile that marks an enemy champion.  Recast to dash to them and deal damage.
spell_vexw_summary: Gain a shield and damage nearby enemies.
spell_vie_summary: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.
spell_viegoe_summary: Viego commands the Black Mist to haunt and surround a piece of terrain. Viego can hide in the Mist as a wraith, gaining camouflage, Move Speed, and Attack Speed.
spell_viegopassive_summary: Enemies who fall before Viego become wraiths. By attacking a wraith, Viego temporarily seizes control of the dead enemy's body, healing for a percentage of his target's max health and gaining access to their basic abilities and items. He replaces their Ultimate with a free cast of his own.
spell_viegoq_summary:
Viego's spectral blade passively deals bonus percent current Health damage On-Hit and strikes twice vs. enemies he recently hit with an Ability, stealing Health.

Viego can activate this Ability to thrust his zweihander forward, impaling enemies in front of him.
spell_viegor_summary: Viego teleports to a nearby location and executes an enemy champion on arrival, piercing their heart and causing a destructive shockwave around them that knocks away their allies.
spell_viegow_summary: Viego charges up before dashing forward, releasing a ball of concentrated Black Mist that stuns the first enemy hit.
spell_viktordeathray_summary:
Viktor uses his biomechanical arm to fire a Hextech Ray that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.

Augment: An explosion follows in the Hextech Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.
spell_viktorp_summary: Viktor gains Hex Fragments whenever he kills an enemy. With every 100 Hex Fragments he obtains, Viktor permanently augments an active ability. After upgrading all of his basic abilities, he can gather 100 Hex Fragments to augment his ultimate ability.
spell_vipassive_summary: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.
spell_viq_summary: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.
spell_vir_summary: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.
spell_viw_summary: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.
spell_vladimire_cost: Channeling Cost <font color='#CC3300'>@Effect2Amount@% of max Health (@ChargeHealthTooltip@)</font>
spell_vladimire_summary: Vladimir pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.
spell_vladimirhemoplague_summary: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit.
spell_vladimirp_summary: Every 30 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.6 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).
spell_vladimirq_summary: Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.
spell_vladimirsanguinepool_summary: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.
spell_voidstone_summary: Kassadin takes reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.
spell_volibeare_summary: Volibear summons a lightning bolt at a location, dealing damage and Slowing enemies while granting Volibear a Shield if he's inside the blast radius.
spell_volibearp_summary: Volibear's Attacks and abilities grant Attack Speed, and eventually cause his Attacks to deal bonus magic damage to nearby enemies.
spell_volibearq_summary: Volibear gains speed towards enemies, <status>Stunning</status> and damaging the first one he Attacks.
spell_volibearr_summary: Volibear leaps to a target location, Slowing and damaging enemies beneath him while gaining bonus Health.  Enemy towers near his landing location become temporarily disabled.
spell_volibearw_summary: Volibear damages an enemy, applying on-hit effects and marking them.  Casting this ability again on the same target deals bonus damage and Heals Volibear.
spell_volley_summary: Ashe fires arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.
spell_vorpalspikes_summary: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.
spell_warwicke_summary: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.
spell_warwickp_summary: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.
spell_warwickq_summary: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.
spell_warwickr_summary: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus Move Speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.
spell_warwickw_summary: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining Move Speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 25% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.
spell_wildcards_summary: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
spell_wujustyle_summary: Grants bonus true damage on basic attacks.
spell_xayahe_summary: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.
spell_xayahpassive_summary: After using an ability, Xayah's next basic attacks will hit all targets along their path and leave a <font color='#C200E1'>Feather</font>.
spell_xayahq_summary: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.
spell_xayahr_summary: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.
spell_xayahw_summary: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her Attack Speed and damage while also granting her Move Speed if she attacks a champion.
spell_xeratharcanebarrage2_summary: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.
spell_xeratharcanopulsechargeup_summary: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
spell_xerathlocusofpower2_summary: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.
spell_xerathmagespear_summary: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.
spell_xinzhaoe_summary: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, gaining increased Attack Speed and dealing damage to all enemies in the area, slowing them briefly. This Ability gains increased range against Challenged targets.
spell_xinzhaop_summary: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.
spell_xinzhaoq_summary: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
spell_xinzhaor_summary: Xin Zhao passively challenges an enemy he damaged recently. When activated, Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back, becoming impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.
spell_xinzhaow_summary: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward, slowing affected enemies and marking them as Challenged.
spell_yasuoe_summary:
Dashes through target enemy, dealing magic damage. Each cast increases subsequent dash's damage, up to a max amount.

Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for a few seconds.

If Steel Tempest is cast while dashing, it will strike as a circle.
spell_yasuopassive_summary: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is increased. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.
spell_yasuopassiveshield_summary: This unit is protected by the wind by his side.
spell_yasuoq1wrapper_summary:
Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line.

On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.

Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack and scales with all the same things.
spell_yasuor_summary:
Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.

For a moderate time afterwards, Yasuo's critical strikes gain significant Bonus Armor Penetration.
spell_yasuow_summary: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.
spell_yonee_summary: Yone's spirit leaves his body behind, gaining Move Speed. When this ability ends, Yone's spirit is forced back to his body and he repeats a portion of the damage he dealt as a spirit.
spell_yonepassive_summary: Yone deals magic damage with every second Attack. In addition, his critical strike chance is increased.
spell_yoneq_summary:
Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line.

On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Mortal Steel dashes Yone forward with a gust of wind knocking enemies Airborne.
spell_yoner_summary: Yone blinks behind the last champion in a line with a slash so powerful it pulls all enemies hit towards him.
spell_yonew_summary:
Cleaves forward, damaging all enemies in a cone. Grants a shield to Yone, the value is increased by the number of champions hit by the swipe.

Spirit Cleave's cooldown and cast time scale with attack speed.
spell_yoricke_summary: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that reduces armor, damages, slows and marks enemies. Summoned units gain move speed when moving towards marked targets.
spell_yorickpassive_summary: <font color='#FF9900'>The Cursed Horde:</font> Yorick can summon Mist Walkers to swarm and attack nearby enemies.
spell_yorickq_summary: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target is a champion or large monster or if the target dies, a grave will be dug.
spell_yorickr_summary: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
spell_yorickw_summary: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.
spell_yunarae_summary: Yunara gains decaying Move Speed and becomes Ghosted. While in her Transcendent State she instead dashes in a direction.
spell_yunarap_summary: Yunara's Critical Strikes deal bonus magic damage.
spell_yunaraq_summary: Yunara gains Attack Speed, bonus damage On-Hit, and her Attacks spread to nearby enemies.
spell_yunarar_summary: Yunara enters a Transcendent State that upgrades her basic Abilities.
spell_yunaraw_name: Arc of Judgment | Arc of Ruin
spell_yunaraw_summary: Yunara fires a spinning prayer bead that deals damage and slows enemies. While in her Transcendent State she instead fires off a laser that deals damage and slows enemies.
spell_yuumidamagebeam_summary:
Yuumi channels a barrage of stars that deal damage and slow those hit. Enemies hit by 5 missiles are rooted.
.
spell_yuumihugcast_summary: Yuumi dashes to a target ally, becoming untargetable from everything except turrets. While on her Best Friend, she gains Heal & Shield Power and grants her Ally On-Hit healing.
spell_yuumimagicmissile_summary:
Yuumi fires a missile, dealing damage and slowing first target hit. It deals bonus damage and an enchanced slow if it takes at least 1.35 seconds to get to its target. While on her Best Friend, the slow is always enhanced and grants bonus On-Hit damage to her ally.

While Attached, the missile can be controlled with your cursor for a brief period.
spell_yuumipassive_summary:
Periodically, when Yuumi strikes a champion with an attack or ability, she restores health to herself and the next ally she Attaches to.

While Attached, Yuumi generates a special bond with her allies. The ally with the strongest bond enhances Yuumi's abilities while she is Attached to them.
spell_yuumiqbv2_summary: Yuumi opens a portal that fires a shock blast stunning the first champion hit. If it hits a minion, it ricochets behind in an AoE stunning those there.
spell_yuumir_summary: Yuumi channels five waves that damage enemies and heal allies. Yuumi can move, attach, and cast Zoomies! while channeling. While on her Best Friend, this spell also follows her mouse.
spell_yuumispellshield_summary: Shields Yuumi and boosts Move Speed and Attack Speed. If she's attached, she passes it to her ally instead.
spell_yuumiultrv2_summary: After a 2second delay, Yuumi knocks up and deals damage to all enemies in an area around her.
spell_yuumiultrv3_summary: Yuumi attaches to an enemy champion, then after a delay, she deals damage and knocks up all enemies near her.
spell_yuumiwend_summary: Yuumi can reactivate this spell to dash to another ally champion, or to detach from her current ally.
spell_yuumiwv3bouncebuff_summary: Yuumi fires a missile that marks the first champion hit. After a delay, if the enemy is hit within another time window, they are rooted and take additional damage.
spell_zace_summary: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.
spell_zacq_summary: Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.
spell_zacr_summary: Zac bounces four times, knocking up enemies hit and slowing them.
spell_zacw_summary: Zac explodes outward towards nearby enemies, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage.
spell_zede_summary: Zed and his Shadows slash, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Enemies hit by a Shadow's slash are slowed.
spell_zedpassive_summary: Zed's basic attacks against low health targets deals bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every few seconds against the same enemy champion.
spell_zedq_summary:
Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens.

Each shuriken deals damage to every enemy hit.
spell_zedr_summary: Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds the mark triggers, repeating a portion of all the damage Zed dealt to the target while they were marked.
spell_zedw_summary:
Passive: Zed gains energy whenever he and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability. Energy can only be gained once per cast ability.

Active: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for a few seconds. Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.
spell_zerie_summary: Zeri dashes a short distance and energizes her next 3 shots of Burst Fire, causing them to pierce through enemies. She will vault and grind over any terrain she touches.
spell_zeripassive_summary: Zeri's Attacks deal magic damage and are treated as Abilities. Moving and casting Burst Fire stores up energy in Zeri's Sparkpack. When fully charged her next Attack deals bonus damage.
spell_zeriq_summary: Burst Fire shoots a burst of 7 rounds that deal attack damage to the first enemy hit. This Ability is treated as an Attack.
spell_zerir_summary: Zeri discharges a nova of electricity and overcharges herself, gaining increased damage and stacking Move Speed that refreshes and gets stronger every time she hits an enemy champion. While overcharged, Burst fire becomes a faster triple shot that chains lightning between enemies.
spell_zeriw_summary: Zeri fires an electric pulse that slows and damages the first enemy hit. If the pulse hits a wall it expands into a long range laser.
spell_ziggse_summary: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing. Successive mine detonations on the same target deal reduced damage.
spell_ziggspassivebuff_summary: Periodically, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.
spell_ziggsq_summary: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.
spell_ziggsr_summary: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.
spell_ziggsw_summary:
Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after a delay, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.
spell_zileanq_summary: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.
spell_zileanw_summary: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.
spell_zoee_summary: Causes the target to become drowsy, then fall asleep. While asleep, the target's Magic Resist is reduced. The first source of damage that breaks the sleep is doubled, up to a cap.
spell_zoeq_summary: Zoe fires a missile that she can redirect in flight. Deals more damage the longer it flies in a straight line.
spell_zoer_summary: Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.
spell_zoew_summary: Zoe can pick up the remnants of enemy summoner spell and active item casts and cast them once herself. Whenever she casts a summoner spell, she gains 3 missiles that fire at the nearest target.
spell_zyrae_summary: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Move Speed.
spell_zyraq_summary: Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.
spell_zyrar_summary: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts. Plants within the thicket are enraged.
spell_zyraw_summary: Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Zyra can store multiple seeds at once, and killing enemies reduces Rampant Growth's recharge time.
stat_stone_description_zoewspells: Spell Thief (W) spell shards picked up
template_spell_levelup: <postScriptTitle>Next Level - click to level-up or press [Ctrl-@Hotkey@].</postScriptTitle><postScriptLeft>@listLevelUpType@</postScriptLeft><postScriptRight>@listLevelUpValue@</postScriptRight>
